203  private bool? hasInGameEditableProperties;
204  bool HasInGameEditableProperties
205  {
206  get
207  {
208  if (hasInGameEditableProperties == null)
209  {
210  hasInGameEditableProperties = false;
211  if (SerializableProperties.Values.Any(p => p.Attributes.OfType<InGameEditable>().Any()))
212  {
213  hasInGameEditableProperties = true;
214  }
215  else
216  {
217  foreach (ItemComponent component in components)
218  {
219  if (!component.AllowInGameEditing) { continue; }
220  if (component.SerializableProperties.Values.Any(p => p.Attributes.OfType<InGameEditable>().Any())
221  || component.SerializableProperties.Values.Any(p => p.Attributes.OfType<ConditionallyEditable>().Any(a => a.IsEditable(this))))
222  {
223  hasInGameEditableProperties = true;
224  break;
225  }
226  }
227  }
228  }
229  return (bool)hasInGameEditableProperties;
230  }
231  }

255  }
256 #if SERVER
257  PreviousParentInventory = value;
258 #endif
259  }
260  }

315  [Serialize("", IsPropertySaveable.Yes, alwaysUseInstanceValues: true), ConditionallyEditable(ConditionallyEditable.ConditionType.OnlyByStatusEffectsAndNetwork)]
319  public string DescriptionTag
320  {
321  get { return descriptionTag; }
322  set
323  {
324  if (value == descriptionTag) { return; }
325  if (value.IsNullOrEmpty())
326  {
327  descriptionTag = null;
328  description = null;
329  }
330  else
331  {
332  description = TextManager.Get(value).Value;
333  descriptionTag = value;
334  }
335  if (FullyInitialized &&
336  SerializableProperties != null &&
337  SerializableProperties.TryGetValue(nameof(DescriptionTag).ToIdentifier(), out SerializableProperty property))
338  {
339  GameMain.NetworkMember?.CreateEntityEvent(this, new ChangePropertyEventData(property, this));
340  }
341  }
342  }

389  public bool IsInteractable(Character character)
390  {
391 #if CLIENT
392  if (Screen.Selected is EditorScreen)
393  {
394  return true;
395  }
396 #endif
397  if (IsHidden) { return false; }
398  if (character != null && character.IsOnPlayerTeam)
399  {
400  return IsPlayerTeamInteractable;
401  }
402  else
403  {
404  return !NonInteractable;
405  }
406  }

409 
410  [ConditionallyEditable(ConditionallyEditable.ConditionType.AllowRotating, DecimalCount = 3, ForceShowPlusMinusButtons = true, ValueStep = 0.1f), Serialize(0.0f, IsPropertySaveable.Yes)]
411  public float Rotation
412  {
413  get
414  {
415  return MathHelper.ToDegrees(RotationRad);
416  }
417  set
418  {
419  if (!Prefab.AllowRotatingInEditor) { return; }
420  RotationRad = MathUtils.WrapAnglePi(MathHelper.ToRadians(value));
421 #if CLIENT
422  if (Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen)
423  {
424  SetContainedItemPositions();
425  foreach (var light in GetComponents<LightComponent>())
426  {
427  light.SetLightSourceTransform();
428  }
429  foreach (var turret in GetComponents<Turret>())
430  {
431  turret.UpdateLightComponents();
432  }
433  foreach (var triggerComponent in GetComponents<TriggerComponent>())
434  {
435  triggerComponent.SetPhysicsBodyPosition();
436  }
437  }
438 #endif
439  }
440  }

481  private float scale = 1.0f;
482  public override float Scale
483  {
484  get { return scale; }
485  set
486  {
487  if (scale == value) { return; }
488  scale = MathHelper.Clamp(value, Prefab.MinScale, Prefab.MaxScale);
489 
490  float relativeScale = scale / base.Prefab.Scale;
491 
492  if (!ResizeHorizontal || !ResizeVertical)
493  {
494  int newWidth = ResizeHorizontal ? rect.Width : (int)(defaultRect.Width * relativeScale);
495  int newHeight = ResizeVertical ? rect.Height : (int)(defaultRect.Height * relativeScale);
496  Rect = new Rectangle(rect.X, rect.Y, newWidth, newHeight);
497  }
498 
499  if (components != null)
500  {
501  foreach (ItemComponent component in components)
502  {
503  component.OnScaleChanged();
504  }
505  }
506  }
507  }

700  [Serialize(1.0f, IsPropertySaveable.Yes, "Multiply the maximum condition by this value")]
701  public float HealthMultiplier
702  {
703  get => healthMultiplier;
704  set
705  {
706  float prevConditionPercentage = ConditionPercentage;
707  healthMultiplier = MathHelper.Clamp(value, 0.0f, float.PositiveInfinity);
708  RecalculateConditionValues();
709  condition = MaxCondition * prevConditionPercentage / 100.0f;
710  RecalculateConditionValues();
711  }
712  }

828  {

830  set
831  {
832  tags.Clear();

834  base.Prefab.Tags.ForEach(t => tags.Add(t));
835  // Then add new tags
836  tags = tags.Union(value.ToIdentifiers()).ToHashSet();
837  }

926  public IEnumerable<Item> ContainedItems
927  {
928  get
929  {
930  if (OwnInventories.Length < 2)
931  {
932  if (OwnInventory == null) { yield break; }
933 
934  foreach (var item in OwnInventory.AllItems)
935  {
936  yield return item;
937  }
938  }
939  else
940  {
941  foreach (var inventory in OwnInventories)
942  {
943  foreach (var item in inventory.AllItems)
944  {
945  yield return item;
946  }
947  }
948  }
949  }
950  }

1081  public Item(Rectangle newRect, ItemPrefab itemPrefab, Submarine submarine, bool callOnItemLoaded = true, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID)
1082  : base(itemPrefab, submarine, id)
1083  {
1084  spriteColor = base.Prefab.SpriteColor;
1085 
1086  components = new List<ItemComponent>();
1087  drawableComponents = new List<IDrawableComponent>(); hasComponentsToDraw = false;
1088  tags = new HashSet<Identifier>();
1089  repairables = new List<Repairable>();
1090 
1091  defaultRect = newRect;
1092  rect = newRect;
1093 
1094  condition = MaxCondition = prevCondition = Prefab.Health;
1095  ConditionPercentage = 100.0f;
1096 
1097  lastSentCondition = condition;
1098 
1099  AllowDeconstruct = itemPrefab.AllowDeconstruct;
1100 
1101  allPropertyObjects.Add(this);
1102 
1103  ContentXElement element = itemPrefab.ConfigElement;
1104  if (element == null) return;
1105 
1106  SerializableProperties = SerializableProperty.DeserializeProperties(this, element);
1107 
1108  if (submarine == null || !submarine.Loading) { FindHull(); }
1109 
1110  SetActiveSprite();
1111 
1112  ContentXElement bodyElement = null;
1113  foreach (var subElement in element.Elements())
1114  {
1115  switch (subElement.Name.ToString().ToLowerInvariant())
1116  {
1117  case "body":
1118  bodyElement = subElement;
1119  float density = subElement.GetAttributeFloat("density", Physics.NeutralDensity);
1120  float minDensity = subElement.GetAttributeFloat("mindensity", density);
1121  float maxDensity = subElement.GetAttributeFloat("maxdensity", density);
1122  if (minDensity < maxDensity)
1123  {
1124  var rand = new Random(ID);
1125  density = MathHelper.Lerp(minDensity, maxDensity, (float)rand.NextDouble());
1126  }
1127 
1128  string collisionCategoryStr = subElement.GetAttributeString("collisioncategory", null);
1129 
1130  Category collisionCategory = Physics.CollisionItem;
1131  Category collidesWith = Physics.DefaultItemCollidesWith;
1132  if ((Prefab.DamagedByProjectiles || Prefab.DamagedByMeleeWeapons || Prefab.DamagedByRepairTools) && Condition > 0)
1133  {
1134  //force collision category to Character to allow projectiles and weapons to hit
1135  //(we could also do this by making the projectiles and weapons hit CollisionItem
1136  //and check if the collision should be ignored in the OnCollision callback, but
1137  //that'd make the hit detection more expensive because every item would be included)
1138  collisionCategory = Physics.CollisionCharacter;
1139  collidesWith |= Physics.CollisionProjectile;
1140  }
1141  if (collisionCategoryStr != null)
1142  {
1143  if (!Physics.TryParseCollisionCategory(collisionCategoryStr, out Category cat))
1144  {
1145  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Invalid collision category in item \"" + Name + "\" (" + collisionCategoryStr + ")",
1146  contentPackage: element.ContentPackage);
1147  }
1148  else
1149  {
1150  collisionCategory = cat;
1151  if (cat.HasFlag(Physics.CollisionCharacter))
1152  {
1153  collisionCategory |= Physics.CollisionProjectile;
1154  }
1155  }
1156  }
1157  body = new PhysicsBody(subElement, ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(Position), Scale, density, collisionCategory, collidesWith, findNewContacts: false);
1158  body.FarseerBody.AngularDamping = subElement.GetAttributeFloat("angulardamping", 0.2f);
1159  body.FarseerBody.LinearDamping = subElement.GetAttributeFloat("lineardamping", 0.1f);
1160  body.UserData = this;
1161  break;
1162  case "trigger":
1163  case "inventoryicon":
1164  case "sprite":
1165  case "deconstruct":
1166  case "brokensprite":
1167  case "decorativesprite":
1168  case "upgradepreviewsprite":
1169  case "price":
1170  case "levelcommonness":
1171  case "suitabletreatment":
1172  case "containedsprite":
1173  case "fabricate":
1174  case "fabricable":
1175  case "fabricableitem":
1176  case "upgrade":
1177  case "preferredcontainer":
1178  case "upgrademodule":
1179  case "upgradeoverride":
1180  case "minimapicon":
1181  case "infectedsprite":
1182  case "damagedinfectedsprite":
1183  case "swappableitem":
1184  case "skillrequirementhint":
1185  break;
1186  case "staticbody":
1187  StaticBodyConfig = subElement;
1188  break;
1189  case "aitarget":
1190  aiTarget = new AITarget(this, subElement);
1191  break;
1192  default:
1193  ItemComponent ic = ItemComponent.Load(subElement, this);
1194  if (ic == null) break;
1195 
1196  AddComponent(ic);
1197  break;
1198  }
1199  }
1200 
1201  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
1202  {
1203  if (ic is Pickable pickable)
1204  {
1205  foreach (var allowedSlot in pickable.AllowedSlots)
1206  {
1207  allowedSlots.Add(allowedSlot);
1208  }
1209  }
1210 
1211  if (ic is Repairable repairable) { repairables.Add(repairable); }
1212 
1213  if (ic is IDrawableComponent && ic.Drawable)
1214  {
1215  drawableComponents.Add(ic as IDrawableComponent);
1216  hasComponentsToDraw = true;
1217  }
1218 
1219  if (ic.statusEffectLists == null) { continue; }
1220  if (ic.InheritStatusEffects)
1221  {
1222  // Inherited status effects are added when the ItemComponent is initialized at ItemComponent.cs:332.
1223  // Don't create duplicate effects here.
1224  continue;
1225  }
1226 
1227  statusEffectLists ??= new Dictionary<ActionType, List<StatusEffect>>();
1228 
1229  //go through all the status effects of the component
1230  //and add them to the corresponding statuseffect list
1231  foreach (List<StatusEffect> componentEffectList in ic.statusEffectLists.Values)
1232  {
1233  ActionType actionType = componentEffectList.First().type;
1234  if (!statusEffectLists.TryGetValue(actionType, out List<StatusEffect> statusEffectList))
1235  {
1236  statusEffectList = new List<StatusEffect>();
1237  statusEffectLists.Add(actionType, statusEffectList);
1238  hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)actionType] = true;
1239  }
1240 
1241  foreach (StatusEffect effect in componentEffectList)
1242  {
1243  statusEffectList.Add(effect);
1244  }
1245  }
1246  }
1247 
1248  hasInWaterStatusEffects = hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)ActionType.InWater];
1249  hasNotInWaterStatusEffects = hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)ActionType.NotInWater];
1250 
1251  if (body != null)
1252  {
1253  body.Submarine = submarine;
1254  originalWaterDragCoefficient = bodyElement.GetAttributeFloat("waterdragcoefficient", 5.0f);
1255  }
1256 
1257  //cache connections into a dictionary for faster lookups
1258  var connectionPanel = GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>();
1259  if (connectionPanel != null)
1260  {
1261  connections = new Dictionary<string, Connection>();
1262  foreach (Connection c in connectionPanel.Connections)
1263  {
1264  if (!connections.ContainsKey(c.Name))
1265  connections.Add(c.Name, c);
1266  }
1267  }
1268 
1269  if (body != null)
1270  {
1271  body.FarseerBody.OnCollision += OnCollision;
1272  }
1273 
1274  var itemContainer = GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
1275  if (itemContainer != null)
1276  {
1277  ownInventory = itemContainer.Inventory;
1278  }
1279 
1280  OwnInventories = GetComponents<ItemContainer>().Select(ic => ic.Inventory).ToImmutableArray();
1281 
1282  qualityComponent = GetComponent<Quality>();
1283 
1284  IsLadder = GetComponent<Ladder>() != null;
1285  IsSecondaryItem = IsLadder || GetComponent<Controller>() is { IsSecondaryItem: true };
1286 
1287  InitProjSpecific();
1288 
1289  if (callOnItemLoaded)
1290  {
1291  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
1292  {
1293  ic.OnItemLoaded();
1294  }
1295  }
1296 
1297  var holdables = components.Where(c => c is Holdable);
1298  if (holdables.Count() > 1)
1299  {
1300  DebugConsole.AddWarning($"Item {Prefab.Identifier} has multiple {nameof(Holdable)} components ({string.Join(", ", holdables.Select(h => h.GetType().Name))}).",
1301  Prefab.ContentPackage);
1302  }
1303 
1304  InsertToList();
1305  ItemList.Add(this);
1306  if (Prefab.IsDangerous) { dangerousItems.Add(this); }
1307  if (Repairables.Any()) { repairableItems.Add(this); }
1308  if (Prefab.SonarSize > 0.0f) { sonarVisibleItems.Add(this); }
1309  CheckCleanable();
1310 
1311  DebugConsole.Log("Created " + Name + " (" + ID + ")");
1312 
1313  if (Components.Any(ic => ic is Wire) && Components.All(ic => ic is Wire || ic is Holdable)) { isWire = true; }
1314  if (HasTag(Barotrauma.Tags.LogicItem)) { isLogic = true; }
1315 
1316  GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("item.created", this);
1317 
1318  ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSpawn, 1.0f);
1319 
1320  // Set max condition multipliers from campaign settings for RecalculateConditionValues()
1321  if (GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign is CampaignMode campaign)
1322  {
1323  if (HasTag(Barotrauma.Tags.OxygenSource))
1324  {
1325  conditionMultiplierCampaign *= campaign.Settings.OxygenMultiplier;
1326  }
1327  if (HasTag(Barotrauma.Tags.ReactorFuel))
1328  {
1329  conditionMultiplierCampaign *= campaign.Settings.FuelMultiplier;
1330  }
1331  }
1332  if (!HasBeenInstantiatedOnce)
1333  {
1334  // This only needs to be done on the very first instantiation.
1335  // MaxCondition will be multiplied in RecalculateConditionValues(), ensuring
1336  // that Condition will stay in line with the multiplier from then on.
1337  condition *= conditionMultiplierCampaign;
1338  }
1339 
1340  RecalculateConditionValues();
1341 
1342  if (callOnItemLoaded)
1343  {
1344  FullyInitialized = true;
1345  }
1346 #if CLIENT
1347  Submarine.ForceVisibilityRecheck();
1348 #endif
1349  HasBeenInstantiatedOnce = true; // Enable executing certain things only once
1350  }

1354  public bool IsContainerPreferred(ItemContainer container, out bool isPreferencesDefined, out bool isSecondary, bool requireConditionRestriction = false)
1355  => Prefab.IsContainerPreferred(this, container, out isPreferencesDefined, out isSecondary, requireConditionRestriction);
1356 
1357  public override MapEntity Clone()
1358  {
1359  Item clone = new Item(rect, Prefab, Submarine, callOnItemLoaded: false)
1360  {
1361  defaultRect = defaultRect
1362  };
1363  foreach (KeyValuePair<Identifier, SerializableProperty> property in SerializableProperties)
1364  {
1365  if (property.Value.Attributes.OfType<Serialize>().None()) { continue; }
1366  clone.SerializableProperties[property.Key].TrySetValue(clone, property.Value.GetValue(this));
1367  }
1368 
1369  if (components.Count != clone.components.Count)
1370  {
1371  string errorMsg = "Error while cloning item \"" + Name + "\" - clone does not have the same number of components. ";
1372  errorMsg += "Original components: " + string.Join(", ", components.Select(c => c.GetType().ToString()));
1373  errorMsg += ", cloned components: " + string.Join(", ", clone.components.Select(c => c.GetType().ToString()));
1374  DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
1375  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Item.Clone:" + Name, GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
1376  }
1377 
1378  for (int i = 0; i < components.Count && i < clone.components.Count; i++)
1379  {
1380  //order the properties to get them to be applied in a consistent order (may matter for properties that are interconnected somehow, like IsOn/IsActive)
1381  foreach (KeyValuePair<Identifier, SerializableProperty> property in components[i].SerializableProperties.OrderBy(s => s.Key))
1382  {
1383  if (property.Value.Attributes.OfType<Serialize>().None()) { continue; }
1384  clone.components[i].SerializableProperties[property.Key].TrySetValue(clone.components[i], property.Value.GetValue(components[i]));
1385  }
1386 
1387  //clone requireditem identifiers
1388  foreach (var kvp in components[i].RequiredItems)
1389  {
1390  for (int j = 0; j < kvp.Value.Count; j++)
1391  {
1392  if (!clone.components[i].RequiredItems.ContainsKey(kvp.Key) ||
1393  clone.components[i].RequiredItems[kvp.Key].Count <= j)
1394  {
1395  continue;
1396  }
1397 
1398  clone.components[i].RequiredItems[kvp.Key][j].JoinedIdentifiers =
1399  kvp.Value[j].JoinedIdentifiers;
1400  }
1401  }
1402  }
1403 
1404  if (FlippedX) { clone.FlipX(false); }
1405  if (FlippedY) { clone.FlipY(false); }
1406 
1407  // Flipping an item tampers with its rotation, so restore it
1408  clone.Rotation = Rotation;
1409 
1410  foreach (ItemComponent component in clone.components)
1411  {
1412  component.OnItemLoaded();
1413  }
1414 
1415  Dictionary<ushort, Item> clonedContainedItems = new();
1416 
1417  for (int i = 0; i < components.Count && i < clone.components.Count; i++)
1418  {
1419  ItemComponent component = components[i],
1420  cloneComp = clone.components[i];
1421 
1422  if (component is not ItemContainer origInv ||
1423  cloneComp is not ItemContainer cloneInv)
1424  {
1425  continue;
1426  }
1427 
1428  foreach (var containedItem in origInv.Inventory.AllItems)
1429  {
1430  var containedClone = (Item)containedItem.Clone();
1431 
1432  cloneInv.Inventory.TryPutItem(containedClone, null);
1433  clonedContainedItems.Add(containedItem.ID, containedClone);
1434  }
1435  }
1436 
1437  for (int i = 0; i < components.Count && i < clone.components.Count; i++)
1438  {
1439  ItemComponent component = components[i],
1440  cloneComp = clone.components[i];
1441 
1442  if (component is not CircuitBox origBox || cloneComp is not CircuitBox cloneBox)
1443  {
1444  continue;
1445  }
1446 
1447  cloneBox.CloneFrom(origBox, clonedContainedItems);
1448  }
1449 
1450  clone.FullyInitialized = true;
1451  return clone;
1452  }
1453 
1454  public void AddComponent(ItemComponent component)
1455  {
1456  allPropertyObjects.Add(component);
1457  components.Add(component);
1458 
1459  if (component.IsActive || component.UpdateWhenInactive || component.Parent != null || (component.IsActiveConditionals != null && component.IsActiveConditionals.Any()))
1460  {
1461  updateableComponents.Add(component);
1462  }
1463 
1464  component.OnActiveStateChanged += (bool isActive) =>
1465  {
1466  bool needsSoundUpdate = false;
1467 #if CLIENT
1468  needsSoundUpdate = component.NeedsSoundUpdate();
1469 #endif
1470  //component doesn't need to be updated if it isn't active, doesn't have a parent that could activate it,
1471  //nor sounds or conditionals that would need to run
1472  if (!isActive && !component.UpdateWhenInactive &&
1473  !needsSoundUpdate &&
1474  component.Parent == null &&
1475  (component.IsActiveConditionals == null || !component.IsActiveConditionals.Any()))
1476  {
1477  if (updateableComponents.Contains(component)) { updateableComponents.Remove(component); }
1478  }
1479  else
1480  {
1481  if (!updateableComponents.Contains(component))
1482  {
1483  updateableComponents.Add(component);
1484  this.isActive = true;
1485  }
1486  }
1487  };
1488 
1489  Type type = component.GetType();
1490  if (!componentsByType.ContainsKey(type))
1491  {
1492  componentsByType.Add(type, component);
1493  Type baseType = type.BaseType;
1494  while (baseType != null && baseType != typeof(ItemComponent))
1495  {
1496  if (!componentsByType.ContainsKey(baseType))
1497  {
1498  componentsByType.Add(baseType, component);
1499  }
1500  baseType = baseType.BaseType;
1501  }
1502  }
1503  }

1535  public T GetComponent<T>() where T : ItemComponent
1536  {
1537  if (componentsByType.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out ItemComponent component))
1538  {
1539  return (T)component;
1540  }
1541  if (typeof(T) == typeof(ItemComponent))
1542  {
1543  return (T)components.FirstOrDefault();
1544  }
1545  return default;
1546  }
1547 
1548  public IEnumerable<T> GetComponents<T>()
1549  {
1550  if (typeof(T) == typeof(ItemComponent))
1551  {
1552  return components.Cast<T>();
1553  }
1554  if (!componentsByType.ContainsKey(typeof(T))) { return Enumerable.Empty<T>(); }
1555  return components.Where(c => c is T).Cast<T>();
1556  }

1569  public void SetTransform(Vector2 simPosition, float rotation, bool findNewHull = true, bool setPrevTransform = true)
1570  {
1571  if (!MathUtils.IsValid(simPosition))
1572  {
1573  string errorMsg =
1574  "Attempted to move the item " + Name +
1575  " to an invalid position (" + simPosition + ")\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
1576 
1577  DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
1578  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce(
1579  "Item.SetPosition:InvalidPosition" + ID,
1580  GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error,
1581  errorMsg);
1582  return;
1583  }
1584 
1585  if (body != null)
1586  {
1587 #if DEBUG
1588  try
1589  {
1590 #endif
1591  if (!body.PhysEnabled || Submarine.Unloading)
1592  {
1593  body.SetTransformIgnoreContacts(simPosition, rotation, setPrevTransform);
1594  }
1595  else
1596  {
1597  body.SetTransform(simPosition, rotation, setPrevTransform);
1598  }
1599 #if DEBUG
1600  }
1601  catch (Exception e)
1602  {
1603  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to set item transform", e);
1604  }
1605 #endif
1606  }
1607 
1608  Vector2 displayPos = ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(simPosition);
1609 
1610  rect.X = (int)MathF.Round(displayPos.X - rect.Width / 2.0f);
1611  rect.Y = (int)MathF.Round(displayPos.Y + rect.Height / 2.0f);
1612 
1613  if (findNewHull) { FindHull(); }
1614  }
1615 
1619  public bool AllowDroppingOnSwapWith(Item otherItem)
1620  {
1621  if (!Prefab.AllowDroppingOnSwap || otherItem == null) { return false; }
1622  if (Prefab.AllowDroppingOnSwapWith.Any())
1623  {
1624  foreach (Identifier tagOrIdentifier in Prefab.AllowDroppingOnSwapWith)
1625  {
1626  if (otherItem.Prefab.Identifier == tagOrIdentifier) { return true; }
1627  if (otherItem.HasTag(tagOrIdentifier)) { return true; }
1628  }
1629  return false;
1630  }
1631  else
1632  {
1633  return true;
1634  }
1635  }

1647  public void CheckCleanable()
1648  {
1649  var pickable = GetComponent<Pickable>();
1650  if (pickable != null && !pickable.IsAttached &&
1651  Prefab.PreferredContainers.Any() &&
1652  (container == null || container.HasTag(Barotrauma.Tags.AllowCleanup)))
1653  {
1654  if (!cleanableItems.Contains(this))
1655  {

1665  public override void Move(Vector2 amount, bool ignoreContacts = true)
1666  {

1668  {
1669  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Attempted to move an item by an invalid amount ({amount})\n{Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace()}");
1670  return;

1672

1674 
1675  if (ItemList != null && body != null)
1676  {

1679  body.SetTransformIgnoreContacts(body.SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(amount), body.Rotation);
1680  }
1681  else

1684  }

1687  {
1688  ic.Move(amount, ignoreContacts);

1694  public Rectangle TransformTrigger(Rectangle trigger, bool world = false)
1695  {
1696  Rectangle baseRect = world ? WorldRect : Rect;
1697 
1698  Rectangle transformedRect =
1699  new Rectangle(
1700  (int)(baseRect.X + trigger.X * Scale),
1701  (int)(baseRect.Y + trigger.Y * Scale),
1702  (trigger.Width == 0) ? Rect.Width : (int)(trigger.Width * Scale),
1703  (trigger.Height == 0) ? Rect.Height : (int)(trigger.Height * Scale));
1704 
1705  if (FlippedX)
1706  {
1707  transformedRect.X = baseRect.X + (baseRect.Right - transformedRect.Right);
1708  }
1709  if (FlippedY)
1710  {
1711  transformedRect.Y = baseRect.Y + ((baseRect.Y - baseRect.Height) - (transformedRect.Y - transformedRect.Height));
1712  }
1713 
1714  return transformedRect;
1715  }

1760  private void RefreshRootContainer()
1761  {
1762  Item newRootContainer = null;
1763  inWaterProofContainer = false;
1764  if (Container != null)
1765  {
1766  Item rootContainer = Container;
1767  inWaterProofContainer |= Container.WaterProof;
1768 
1769  while (rootContainer.Container != null)
1770  {
1771  rootContainer = rootContainer.Container;
1772  if (rootContainer == this)
1773  {
1774  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Invalid container hierarchy: \"{Prefab.Identifier}\" was contained inside itself!\n{Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace()}");
1775  rootContainer = null;
1776  break;
1777  }
1778  inWaterProofContainer |= rootContainer.WaterProof;
1779  }
1780  newRootContainer = rootContainer;
1781  }
1782  if (newRootContainer != RootContainer)
1783  {
1784  RootContainer = newRootContainer;
1785  isActive = true;
1786  foreach (Item containedItem in ContainedItems)
1787  {
1788  containedItem.RefreshRootContainer();
1789  }
1790  }
1791  }

1799  inWaterProofContainer = true;
1800  }

1803  containedItem.RefreshInWaterProofContainer();

1917  public bool ConditionalMatches(PropertyConditional conditional)
1918  {
1919  return ConditionalMatches(conditional, checkContainer: true);
1920  }
1921 
1922  public bool ConditionalMatches(PropertyConditional conditional, bool checkContainer)
1923  {
1924  if (checkContainer)
1925  {
1926  if (conditional.TargetContainer)
1927  {
1928  if (conditional.TargetGrandParent)
1929  {
1930  return container?.container != null && container.container.ConditionalMatches(conditional, checkContainer: false);
1931  }
1932  return container != null && container.ConditionalMatches(conditional, checkContainer: false);
1933  }
1934  }
1935  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(conditional.TargetItemComponent))
1936  {
1937  return conditional.Matches(this);
1938  }
1939  else
1940  {
1941  switch (conditional.ItemComponentComparison)
1942  {
1943  case PropertyConditional.LogicalOperatorType.Or:
1944  {
1945  foreach (ItemComponent c in components)
1946  {
1947  if (MatchesComponent(c, conditional) && conditional.Matches(c))
1948  {
1949  // Some conditional matched, which is enough.
1950  return true;
1951  }
1952  }
1953  // Didn't find any matching components.
1954  return false;
1955  }
1956  case PropertyConditional.LogicalOperatorType.And:
1957  {
1958  bool matchingComponentFound = false;
1959  foreach (ItemComponent c in components)
1960  {
1961  if (!MatchesComponent(c, conditional)) { continue; }
1962  matchingComponentFound = true;
1963  if (!conditional.Matches(c))
1964  {
1965  // Some conditional didn't match -> fail.
1966  return false;
1967  }
1968  }
1969  // Found at least one matching component and no mismatches.
1970  return matchingComponentFound;
1971  }
1972  default:
1973  throw new NotSupportedException();
1974  }
1975  static bool MatchesComponent(ItemComponent comp, PropertyConditional cond) => comp.Name == cond.TargetItemComponent;
1976  }
1977  }
1978 
1982  public void ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType type, float deltaTime, Character character = null, Limb limb = null, Entity useTarget = null, bool isNetworkEvent = false, Vector2? worldPosition = null)
1983  {
1984  if (!hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)type]) { return; }
1985 
1986  foreach (StatusEffect effect in statusEffectLists[type])
1987  {
1988  ApplyStatusEffect(effect, type, deltaTime, character, limb, useTarget, isNetworkEvent, checkCondition: false, worldPosition);
1989  }
1990  }
1991 
1992  readonly List<ISerializableEntity> targets = new List<ISerializableEntity>();
1993 
1994  public void ApplyStatusEffect(StatusEffect effect, ActionType type, float deltaTime, Character character = null, Limb limb = null, Entity useTarget = null, bool isNetworkEvent = false, bool checkCondition = true, Vector2? worldPosition = null)
1995  {
1996  if (effect.ShouldWaitForInterval(this, deltaTime)) { return; }
1997  if (!isNetworkEvent && checkCondition)
1998  {
1999  if (condition == 0.0f && !effect.AllowWhenBroken && effect.type != ActionType.OnBroken) { return; }
2000  }
2001  if (effect.type != type) { return; }
2002 
2003  bool hasTargets = effect.TargetIdentifiers == null;
2004 
2005  targets.Clear();
2006 
2007  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Contained))
2008  {
2009  foreach (Item containedItem in ContainedItems)
2010  {
2011  if (effect.TargetIdentifiers != null &&
2012  !effect.TargetIdentifiers.Contains(((MapEntity)containedItem).Prefab.Identifier) &&
2013  !effect.TargetIdentifiers.Any(id => containedItem.HasTag(id)))
2014  {
2015  continue;
2016  }
2017 
2018  if (effect.TargetSlot > -1)
2019  {
2020  if (!OwnInventory.GetItemsAt(effect.TargetSlot).Contains(containedItem)) { continue; }
2021  }
2022 
2023  hasTargets = true;
2024  targets.Add(containedItem);
2025  }
2026  }
2027 
2028  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.NearbyCharacters) || effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.NearbyItems))
2029  {
2030  effect.AddNearbyTargets(WorldPosition, targets);
2031  if (targets.Count > 0)
2032  {
2033  hasTargets = true;
2034  }
2035  }
2036 
2037  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.UseTarget) && useTarget is ISerializableEntity serializableTarget)
2038  {
2039  hasTargets = true;
2040  targets.Add(serializableTarget);
2041  }
2042 
2043  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.LinkedEntities))
2044  {
2045  foreach (var linkedEntity in linkedTo)
2046  {
2047  if (linkedEntity is Item linkedItem)
2048  {
2049  targets.AddRange(linkedItem.AllPropertyObjects);
2050  }
2051  else if (linkedEntity is ISerializableEntity serializableEntity)
2052  {
2053  targets.Add(serializableEntity);
2054  }
2055  }
2056  }
2057 
2058  if (!hasTargets) { return; }
2059 
2060  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Hull) && CurrentHull != null)
2061  {
2062  targets.Add(CurrentHull);
2063  }
2064 
2065  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.This))
2066  {
2067  foreach (var pobject in AllPropertyObjects)
2068  {
2069  targets.Add(pobject);
2070  }
2071  }
2072 
2073  if (character != null)
2074  {
2075  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Character))
2076  {
2077  if (type == ActionType.OnContained && ParentInventory is CharacterInventory characterInventory)
2078  {
2079  targets.Add(characterInventory.Owner as ISerializableEntity);
2080  }
2081  else
2082  {
2083  targets.Add(character);
2084  }
2085  }
2086  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.AllLimbs))
2087  {
2088  targets.AddRange(character.AnimController.Limbs);
2089  }
2090  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Limb) && limb == null && effect.targetLimbs != null)
2091  {
2092  foreach (var characterLimb in character.AnimController.Limbs)
2093  {
2094  if (effect.targetLimbs.Contains(characterLimb.type)) { targets.Add(characterLimb); }
2095  }
2096  }
2097  }
2098  if (effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Limb) && limb != null)
2099  {
2100  targets.Add(limb);
2101  }
2102 
2103  if (Container != null && effect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Parent)) { targets.AddRange(Container.AllPropertyObjects); }
2104 
2105  effect.Apply(type, deltaTime, this, targets, worldPosition);
2106  }

2110  {
2111  if (Indestructible || InvulnerableToDamage) { return new AttackResult(); }
2112 
2113  float damageAmount = attack.GetItemDamage(deltaTime, Prefab.ItemDamageMultiplier);
2114  Condition -= damageAmount;
2115 
2116  if (damageAmount >= Prefab.OnDamagedThreshold)

2119  }

2123 
2124  private void SetCondition(float value, bool isNetworkEvent, bool executeEffects = true)
2125  {
2126  if (!isNetworkEvent)
2127  {
2128  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
2129  }
2130  if (!MathUtils.IsValid(value)) { return; }
2131  if (Indestructible) { return; }
2132  if (InvulnerableToDamage && value <= condition) { return; }
2133 
2134  bool wasInFullCondition = IsFullCondition;
2135 
2136  float diff = value - condition;
2137  if (GetComponent<Door>() is Door door && door.IsStuck && diff < 0)
2138  {
2139  float dmg = -diff;
2140  // When the door is fully welded shut, reduce the welded state instead of the condition.
2141  float prevStuck = door.Stuck;
2142  door.Stuck -= dmg;
2143  if (door.IsStuck) { return; }
2144  // Reduce the damage by the amount we just adjusted the welded state by.
2145  float damageReduction = dmg - prevStuck;
2146  if (damageReduction < 0) { return; }
2147  value -= damageReduction;
2148  }
2149 
2150  condition = MathHelper.Clamp(value, 0.0f, MaxCondition);
2151 
2152  if (MathUtils.NearlyEqual(prevCondition, value, epsilon: 0.000001f)) { return; }
2153 
2154  RecalculateConditionValues();
2155 
2156  bool wasPreviousConditionChanged = false;
2157  if (condition == 0.0f && prevCondition > 0.0f)
2158  {
2159  //Flag connections to be updated as device is broken
2160  flagChangedConnections(connections);
2161 #if CLIENT
2162  if (executeEffects)
2163  {
2164  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
2165  {
2166  ic.PlaySound(ActionType.OnBroken);
2167  ic.StopSounds(ActionType.OnActive);
2168  }
2169  }
2170  if (Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen) { return; }
2171 #endif
2172  // Have to set the previous condition here or OnBroken status effects that reduce the condition will keep triggering the status effects, resulting in a stack overflow.
2173  SetPreviousCondition();
2174  if (executeEffects)
2175  {
2176  ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnBroken, 1.0f, null);
2177  }
2178  }
2179  else if (condition > 0.0f && prevCondition <= 0.0f)
2180  {
2181  //Flag connections to be updated as device is now working again
2182  flagChangedConnections(connections);
2183  }
2184 
2185  SetActiveSprite();
2186 
2187  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
2188  {
2189  bool needsConditionUpdate = false;
2190  if (!MathUtils.NearlyEqual(lastSentCondition, condition) && (condition <= 0.0f || condition >= MaxCondition))
2191  {
2192  //send the update immediately if the condition changed to max or min
2193  sendConditionUpdateTimer = 0.0f;
2194  needsConditionUpdate = true;
2195  }
2196  else if (Math.Abs(lastSentCondition - condition) > 1.0f || wasInFullCondition != IsFullCondition)
2197  {
2198  needsConditionUpdate = true;
2199  }
2200  if (needsConditionUpdate && !itemsWithPendingConditionUpdates.Contains(this))
2201  {
2202  itemsWithPendingConditionUpdates.Add(this);
2203  }
2204  }
2205 
2206  if (!wasPreviousConditionChanged)
2207  {
2208  SetPreviousCondition();
2209  }
2210 
2211  void SetPreviousCondition()
2212  {
2213  LastConditionChange = condition - prevCondition;
2214  ConditionLastUpdated = Timing.TotalTime;
2215  prevCondition = condition;
2216  wasPreviousConditionChanged = true;
2217  }
2218 
2219  static void flagChangedConnections(Dictionary<string, Connection> connections)
2220  {
2221  if (connections == null) { return; }
2222  foreach (Connection c in connections.Values)
2223  {
2224  if (c.IsPower)
2225  {
2226  Powered.ChangedConnections.Add(c);
2227  foreach (Connection conn in c.Recipients)
2228  {
2229  Powered.ChangedConnections.Add(conn);
2230  }
2231  }
2232  }
2233  }
2234  }
2235 
2240  public void RecalculateConditionValues()
2241  {
2242  MaxCondition = Prefab.Health * healthMultiplier * conditionMultiplierCampaign * maxRepairConditionMultiplier * (1.0f + GetQualityModifier(Items.Components.Quality.StatType.Condition));
2243  IsFullCondition = MathUtils.NearlyEqual(Condition, MaxCondition);
2244  ConditionPercentage = MathUtils.Percentage(Condition, MaxCondition);
2245  }

2255  public void SendPendingNetworkUpdates()
2256  {
2257  if (!(GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsServer: true })) { return; }

2259  SendPendingNetworkUpdatesInternal();

2275  public static void UpdatePendingConditionUpdates(float deltaTime)
2276  {
2277  if (GameMain.NetworkMember is not { IsServer: true }) { return; }
2278  for (int i = 0; i < itemsWithPendingConditionUpdates.Count; i++)
2279  {
2280  var item = itemsWithPendingConditionUpdates[i];
2281  if (item == null || item.Removed)
2282  {
2283  itemsWithPendingConditionUpdates.RemoveAt(i--);
2284  continue;
2285  }
2286  if (item.Submarine is { Loading: true }) { continue; }
2287 
2288  item.sendConditionUpdateTimer -= deltaTime;
2289  if (item.sendConditionUpdateTimer <= 0.0f)
2290  {
2291  item.SendPendingNetworkUpdatesInternal();
2292  itemsWithPendingConditionUpdates.RemoveAt(i--);
2293  }
2294  }
2295  }

2299  public override void Update(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
2300  {
2301  if (!isActive || IsLayerHidden) { return; }
2302 
2303  if (impactQueue != null)
2304  {
2305  while (impactQueue.TryDequeue(out float impact))
2306  {
2307  HandleCollision(impact);
2308  }
2309  }
2310  if (isDroppedStackOwner && body != null)
2311  {
2312  foreach (var item in droppedStack)
2313  {
2314  if (item != this)
2315  {
2316  item.body.Enabled = false;
2317  item.body.SetTransformIgnoreContacts(this.SimPosition, body.Rotation);
2318  }
2319  }
2320  }
2321 
2322  if (aiTarget != null && aiTarget.NeedsUpdate)
2323  {
2324  aiTarget.Update(deltaTime);
2325  }
2326 
2327  var containedEffectType = parentInventory == null ? ActionType.OnNotContained : ActionType.OnContained;
2328 
2329  ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.Always, deltaTime, character: (parentInventory as CharacterInventory)?.Owner as Character);
2330  ApplyStatusEffects(containedEffectType, deltaTime, character: (parentInventory as CharacterInventory)?.Owner as Character);
2331 
2332  for (int i = 0; i < updateableComponents.Count; i++)
2333  {
2334  ItemComponent ic = updateableComponents[i];
2335 
2336  bool isParentInActive = ic.InheritParentIsActive && ic.Parent is { IsActive: false };
2337 
2338  if (ic.IsActiveConditionals != null && !isParentInActive)
2339  {
2340  if (ic.IsActiveConditionalComparison == PropertyConditional.LogicalOperatorType.And)
2341  {
2342  bool shouldBeActive = true;
2343  foreach (var conditional in ic.IsActiveConditionals)
2344  {
2345  if (!ConditionalMatches(conditional))
2346  {
2347  shouldBeActive = false;
2348  break;
2349  }
2350  }
2351  ic.IsActive = shouldBeActive;
2352  }
2353  else
2354  {
2355  bool shouldBeActive = false;
2356  foreach (var conditional in ic.IsActiveConditionals)
2357  {
2358  if (ConditionalMatches(conditional))
2359  {
2360  shouldBeActive = true;
2361  break;
2362  }
2363  }
2364  ic.IsActive = shouldBeActive;
2365  }
2366  }
2367 #if CLIENT
2368  if (ic.HasSounds)
2369  {
2370  ic.PlaySound(ActionType.Always);
2371  ic.UpdateSounds();
2372  if (!ic.WasUsed) { ic.StopSounds(ActionType.OnUse); }
2373  if (!ic.WasSecondaryUsed) { ic.StopSounds(ActionType.OnSecondaryUse); }
2374  }
2375 #endif
2376  ic.WasUsed = false;
2377  ic.WasSecondaryUsed = false;
2378 
2379  if (ic.IsActive || ic.UpdateWhenInactive)
2380  {
2381  if (condition <= 0.0f)
2382  {
2383  ic.UpdateBroken(deltaTime, cam);
2384  }
2385  else
2386  {
2387  ic.Update(deltaTime, cam);
2388 #if CLIENT
2389  if (ic.IsActive)
2390  {
2391  if (ic.IsActiveTimer > 0.02f)
2392  {
2393  ic.PlaySound(ActionType.OnActive);
2394  }
2395  ic.IsActiveTimer += deltaTime;
2396  }
2397 #endif
2398  }
2399  }
2400  }
2401 
2402  if (Removed) { return; }
2403 
2404  bool needsWaterCheck = hasInWaterStatusEffects || hasNotInWaterStatusEffects;
2405  if (body != null && body.Enabled)
2406  {
2407  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(body.FarseerBody.FixtureList != null);
2408 
2409  if (Math.Abs(body.LinearVelocity.X) > 0.01f || Math.Abs(body.LinearVelocity.Y) > 0.01f || transformDirty)
2410  {
2411  if (body.CollisionCategories != Category.None)
2412  {
2413  UpdateTransform();
2414  }
2415  if (CurrentHull == null && Level.Loaded != null && body.SimPosition.Y < ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(Level.MaxEntityDepth))
2416  {
2417  Spawner?.AddItemToRemoveQueue(this);
2418  return;
2419  }
2420  }
2421  needsWaterCheck = true;
2422  UpdateNetPosition(deltaTime);
2423  if (inWater)
2424  {
2425  ApplyWaterForces();
2426  CurrentHull?.ApplyFlowForces(deltaTime, this);
2427  }
2428  }
2429 
2430  if (needsWaterCheck)
2431  {
2432  bool wasInWater = inWater;
2433  inWater = !inWaterProofContainer && IsInWater();
2434  if (inWater)
2435  {
2436  //the item has gone through the surface of the water
2437  if (!wasInWater && CurrentHull != null && body != null && body.LinearVelocity.Y < -1.0f)
2438  {
2439  Splash();
2440  if (GetComponent<Projectile>() is not { IsActive: true })
2441  {
2442  //slow the item down (not physically accurate, but looks good enough)
2443  body.LinearVelocity *= 0.2f;
2444  }
2445  }
2446  }
2447  if ((hasInWaterStatusEffects || hasNotInWaterStatusEffects) && condition > 0.0f)
2448  {
2449  ApplyStatusEffects(inWater ? ActionType.InWater : ActionType.NotInWater, deltaTime);
2450  }
2451  if (inWaterProofContainer && !hasNotInWaterStatusEffects)
2452  {
2453  needsWaterCheck = false;
2454  }
2455  }
2456 
2457  if (!needsWaterCheck &&
2458  updateableComponents.Count == 0 &&
2459  (aiTarget == null || !aiTarget.NeedsUpdate) &&
2460  !hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)ActionType.Always] &&
2461  !hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)containedEffectType] &&
2462  (body == null || !body.Enabled))
2463  {
2464 #if CLIENT
2465  positionBuffer.Clear();
2466 #endif
2467  isActive = false;
2468  }
2469 
2470  }

2474  public void UpdateTransform()
2475  {
2476  if (body == null) { return; }
2477  Submarine prevSub = Submarine;
2478 
2479  var projectile = GetComponent<Projectile>();
2480  if (projectile?.StickTarget != null)
2481  {
2482  if (projectile?.StickTarget.UserData is Limb limb && limb.character != null)
2483  {
2484  Submarine = body.Submarine = limb.character.Submarine;
2485  currentHull = limb.character.CurrentHull;
2486  }
2487  else if (projectile.StickTarget.UserData is Structure structure)
2488  {
2489  Submarine = body.Submarine = structure.Submarine;
2490  currentHull = Hull.FindHull(WorldPosition, CurrentHull);
2491  }
2492  else if (projectile.StickTarget.UserData is Item targetItem)
2493  {
2494  Submarine = body.Submarine = targetItem.Submarine;
2495  currentHull = targetItem.CurrentHull;
2496  }
2497  else if (projectile.StickTarget.UserData is Submarine)
2498  {
2499  //attached to a sub from the outside -> don't move inside the sub
2500  Submarine = body.Submarine = null;
2501  currentHull = null;
2502  }
2503  }
2504  else
2505  {
2506  FindHull();
2507  }
2508 
2509  if (Submarine == null && prevSub != null)
2510  {
2511  body.SetTransform(body.SimPosition + prevSub.SimPosition, body.Rotation);
2512  }
2513  else if (Submarine != null && prevSub == null)
2514  {
2515  body.SetTransform(body.SimPosition - Submarine.SimPosition, body.Rotation);
2516  }
2517  else if (Submarine != null && prevSub != null && Submarine != prevSub)
2518  {
2519  body.SetTransform(body.SimPosition + prevSub.SimPosition - Submarine.SimPosition, body.Rotation);
2520  }
2521 
2522  if (Submarine != prevSub)
2523  {
2524  foreach (Item containedItem in ContainedItems)
2525  {
2526  if (containedItem == null) { continue; }
2527  containedItem.Submarine = Submarine;
2528  }
2529  }
2530 
2531  Vector2 displayPos = ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(body.SimPosition);
2532  rect.X = (int)(displayPos.X - rect.Width / 2.0f);
2533  rect.Y = (int)(displayPos.Y + rect.Height / 2.0f);
2534 
2535  if (Math.Abs(body.LinearVelocity.X) > NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity ||
2536  Math.Abs(body.LinearVelocity.Y) > NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity)
2537  {
2538  body.LinearVelocity = new Vector2(
2539  MathHelper.Clamp(body.LinearVelocity.X, -NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity, NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity),
2540  MathHelper.Clamp(body.LinearVelocity.Y, -NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity, NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity));
2541  }
2542 
2543  transformDirty = false;
2544  }
2545 
2549  private void ApplyWaterForces()
2550  {
2551  if (body.Mass <= 0.0f || body.Density <= 0.0f || body.BodyType != BodyType.Dynamic)
2552  {
2553  return;
2554  }
2555 
2556  float forceFactor = 1.0f;
2557  if (CurrentHull != null)
2558  {
2559  float floor = CurrentHull.Rect.Y - CurrentHull.Rect.Height;
2560  float waterLevel = floor + CurrentHull.WaterVolume / CurrentHull.Rect.Width;
2561  //forceFactor is 1.0f if the item is completely submerged,
2562  //and goes to 0.0f as the item goes through the surface
2563  forceFactor = Math.Min((waterLevel - Position.Y) / rect.Height, 1.0f);
2564  if (forceFactor <= 0.0f) { return; }
2565  }
2566 
2567  bool moving = body.LinearVelocity.LengthSquared() > 0.001f;
2568  float volume = body.Mass / body.Density;
2569  if (moving)
2570  {
2571  //measure velocity from the velocity of the front of the item and apply the drag to the other end to get the drag to turn the item the "pointy end first"
2572 
2573  //a more "proper" (but more expensive) way to do this would be to e.g. calculate the drag separately for each edge of the fixture
2574  //but since we define the "front" as the "pointy end", we can cheat a bit by using that, and actually even make the drag appear more realistic in some cases
2575  //(e.g. a bullet with a rectangular fixture would be just as "aerodynamic" travelling backwards, but with this method we get it to turn the correct way)
2576  Vector2 localFront = body.GetLocalFront();
2577  Vector2 frontVel = body.FarseerBody.GetLinearVelocityFromLocalPoint(localFront);
2578 
2579  float speed = frontVel.Length();
2580  float drag = speed * speed * WaterDragCoefficient * volume * Physics.NeutralDensity;
2581  //very small drag on active projectiles to prevent affecting their trajectories much
2582  if (body.FarseerBody.IsBullet) { drag *= 0.1f; }
2583  Vector2 dragVec = -frontVel / speed * drag;
2584 
2585  //apply the force slightly towards the back of the item to make it turn the front first
2586  Vector2 back = body.FarseerBody.GetWorldPoint(-localFront * 0.01f);
2587  body.ApplyForce(dragVec, back);
2588  }
2589 
2590  //no need to apply buoyancy if the item is still and not light enough to float
2591  if (moving || body.Density <= 10.0f)
2592  {
2593  Vector2 buoyancy = -GameMain.World.Gravity * body.FarseerBody.GravityScale * forceFactor * volume * Physics.NeutralDensity;
2594  body.ApplyForce(buoyancy);
2595  }
2596 
2597  //apply simple angular drag
2598  if (Math.Abs(body.AngularVelocity) > 0.0001f)
2599  {
2600  body.ApplyTorque(body.AngularVelocity * volume * -0.1f);
2601  }
2602  }
2603

2605  private bool OnCollision(Fixture f1, Fixture f2, Contact contact)
2606  {
2607  if (transformDirty) { return false; }
2608 
2609  var projectile = GetComponent<Projectile>();
2610  if (projectile != null)
2611  {
2612  // Ignore characters so that the impact sound only plays when the item hits a a wall or a door.
2613  // Projectile collisions are handled in Projectile.OnProjectileCollision(), so it should be safe to do this.
2614  if (f2.CollisionCategories == Physics.CollisionCharacter) { return false; }
2615  if (projectile.IgnoredBodies != null && projectile.IgnoredBodies.Contains(f2.Body)) { return false; }
2616  if (projectile.ShouldIgnoreSubmarineCollision(f2, contact)) { return false; }
2617  }
2618 
2619  if (GameMain.GameSession == null || GameMain.GameSession.RoundDuration > 1.0f)
2620  {
2621  contact.GetWorldManifold(out Vector2 normal, out _);
2622  if (contact.FixtureA.Body == f1.Body) { normal = -normal; }
2623  float impact = Vector2.Dot(f1.Body.LinearVelocity, -normal);
2624  impactQueue ??= new ConcurrentQueue<float>();
2625  impactQueue.Enqueue(impact);
2626  }
2627 
2628  isActive = true;
2629 
2630  return true;
2631  }
2632 
2633  private void HandleCollision(float impact)
2634  {
2635  OnCollisionProjSpecific(impact);
2636  if (GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsClient: true }) { return; }
2637 
2638  if (ImpactTolerance > 0.0f && Math.Abs(impact) > ImpactTolerance && hasStatusEffectsOfType[(int)ActionType.OnImpact])
2639  {
2640  foreach (StatusEffect effect in statusEffectLists[ActionType.OnImpact])
2641  {
2642  ApplyStatusEffect(effect, ActionType.OnImpact, deltaTime: 1.0f);
2643  }
2644 #if SERVER
2645  GameMain.Server?.CreateEntityEvent(this, new ApplyStatusEffectEventData(ActionType.OnImpact));
2646 #endif
2647  }
2648 
2649  foreach (Item contained in ContainedItems)
2650  {
2651  if (contained.body != null) { contained.HandleCollision(impact); }
2652  }
2653  }

2718  public T GetDirectlyConnectedComponent<T>(Func<Connection, bool> connectionFilter = null) where T : ItemComponent
2719  {
2720  ConnectionPanel connectionPanel = GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>();
2721  if (connectionPanel == null) { return null; }
2722  foreach (Connection c in connectionPanel.Connections)
2723  {
2724  if (connectionFilter != null && !connectionFilter(c)) { continue; }
2725  foreach (Connection recipient in c.Recipients)
2726  {
2727  var component = recipient.Item.GetComponent<T>();
2728  if (component != null)
2729  {
2730  return component;
2731  }
2732  }
2733  }
2734  return null;
2735  }

2741  public List<T> GetConnectedComponents<T>(bool recursive = false, bool allowTraversingBackwards = true, Func<Connection, bool> connectionFilter = null) where T : ItemComponent
2742  {
2743  List<T> connectedComponents = new List<T>();
2744 
2745  if (recursive)
2746  {
2747  HashSet<Connection> alreadySearched = new HashSet<Connection>();
2748  GetConnectedComponentsRecursive(alreadySearched, connectedComponents, allowTraversingBackwards: allowTraversingBackwards);
2749  return connectedComponents;
2750  }
2751 
2752  ConnectionPanel connectionPanel = GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>();
2753  if (connectionPanel == null) { return connectedComponents; }
2754 
2755  foreach (Connection c in connectionPanel.Connections)
2756  {
2757  if (connectionFilter != null && !connectionFilter(c)) { continue; }
2758  foreach (Connection recipient in c.Recipients)
2759  {
2760  var component = recipient.Item.GetComponent<T>();
2761  if (component != null && !connectedComponents.Contains(component))
2762  {
2763  connectedComponents.Add(component);
2764  }
2765  }
2766  }
2767 
2768  return connectedComponents;
2769  }

2771  private void GetConnectedComponentsRecursive<T>(HashSet<Connection> alreadySearched, List<T> connectedComponents, bool ignoreInactiveRelays = false, bool allowTraversingBackwards = true) where T : ItemComponent
2772  {

2774  if (connectionPanel == null) { return; }
2775

2777  {
2778  if (!alreadySearched.Add(c)) { continue; }
2779  GetConnectedComponentsRecursive(c, alreadySearched, connectedComponents, ignoreInactiveRelays, allowTraversingBackwards);
2780  }
2781  }

2787  {

2789  HashSet<Connection> alreadySearched = new HashSet<Connection>();
2790  GetConnectedComponentsRecursive(c, alreadySearched, connectedComponents, ignoreInactiveRelays, allowTraversingBackwards);

2795  public static readonly ImmutableArray<(Identifier Input, Identifier Output)> connectionPairs = new (Identifier, Identifier)[]
2796  {
2797  ("power_in".ToIdentifier(), "power_out".ToIdentifier()),
2798  ("signal_in1".ToIdentifier(), "signal_out1".ToIdentifier()),
2799  ("signal_in2".ToIdentifier(), "signal_out2".ToIdentifier()),

2807  private void GetConnectedComponentsRecursive<T>(Connection c, HashSet<Connection> alreadySearched, List<T> connectedComponents, bool ignoreInactiveRelays, bool allowTraversingBackwards = true) where T : ItemComponent
2808  {
2809  alreadySearched.Add(c);
2810  static IEnumerable<Connection> GetRecipients(Connection c)
2811  {
2812  foreach (Connection recipient in c.Recipients)
2813  {
2814  yield return recipient;
2815  }
2816  //check circuit box inputs/outputs this connection is connected to
2817  foreach (var circuitBoxConnection in c.CircuitBoxConnections)
2818  {
2819  yield return circuitBoxConnection.Connection;
2820  }
2821  }
2822 
2823  foreach (Connection recipient in GetRecipients(c))
2824  {
2825  if (alreadySearched.Contains(recipient)) { continue; }
2826  var component = recipient.Item.GetComponent<T>();
2827  if (component != null && !connectedComponents.Contains(component))
2828  {
2829  connectedComponents.Add(component);
2830  }
2831 
2832  var circuitBox = recipient.Item.GetComponent<CircuitBox>();
2833  if (circuitBox != null)
2834  {
2835  //if this is a circuit box, check what the connection is connected to inside the box
2836  var potentialCbConnection = circuitBox.FindInputOutputConnection(recipient);
2837  if (potentialCbConnection.TryUnwrap(out var cbConnection))
2838  {
2839  if (cbConnection is CircuitBoxInputConnection inputConnection)
2840  {
2841  foreach (var connectedTo in inputConnection.ExternallyConnectedTo)
2842  {
2843  if (alreadySearched.Contains(connectedTo.Connection)) { continue; }
2844  CheckRecipient(connectedTo.Connection);
2845  }
2846  }
2847  else
2848  {
2849  foreach (var connectedFrom in cbConnection.ExternallyConnectedFrom)
2850  {
2851  if (alreadySearched.Contains(connectedFrom.Connection) || !allowTraversingBackwards) { continue; }
2852  CheckRecipient(connectedFrom.Connection);
2853  }
2854  }
2855  }
2856  }
2857  CheckRecipient(recipient);
2858 
2859  void CheckRecipient(Connection recipient)
2860  {
2861  //connected to a wifi component -> see which other wifi components it can communicate with
2862  var wifiComponent = recipient.Item.GetComponent<WifiComponent>();
2863  if (wifiComponent != null && wifiComponent.CanTransmit())
2864  {
2865  foreach (var wifiReceiver in wifiComponent.GetTransmittersInRange())
2866  {
2867  var receiverConnections = wifiReceiver.Item.Connections;
2868  if (receiverConnections == null) { continue; }
2869  foreach (Connection wifiOutput in receiverConnections)
2870  {
2871  if ((wifiOutput.IsOutput == recipient.IsOutput) || alreadySearched.Contains(wifiOutput)) { continue; }
2872  GetConnectedComponentsRecursive(wifiOutput, alreadySearched, connectedComponents, ignoreInactiveRelays, allowTraversingBackwards);
2873  }
2874  }
2875  }
2876 
2877  recipient.Item.GetConnectedComponentsRecursive(recipient, alreadySearched, connectedComponents, ignoreInactiveRelays, allowTraversingBackwards);
2878  }
2879  }
2880 
2881  if (ignoreInactiveRelays)
2882  {
2883  var relay = GetComponent<RelayComponent>();
2884  if (relay != null && !relay.IsOn) { return; }
2885  }
2886 
2887  foreach ((Identifier input, Identifier output) in connectionPairs)
2888  {
2889  void searchFromAToB(Identifier connectionEndA, Identifier connectionEndB)
2890  {
2891  if (connectionEndA == c.Name)
2892  {
2893  var pairedConnection = c.Item.Connections.FirstOrDefault(c2 => c2.Name == connectionEndB);
2894  if (pairedConnection != null)
2895  {
2896  if (alreadySearched.Contains(pairedConnection)) { return; }
2897  GetConnectedComponentsRecursive(pairedConnection, alreadySearched, connectedComponents, ignoreInactiveRelays, allowTraversingBackwards);
2898  }
2899  }
2900  }
2901  searchFromAToB(input, output);
2902  if (allowTraversingBackwards) { searchFromAToB(output, input); }
2903  }
2904  }
2905 
2906  public Controller FindController(ImmutableArray<Identifier>? tags = null)
2907  {
2908  //try finding the controller with the simpler non-recursive method first
2909  var controllers = GetConnectedComponents<Controller>();
2910  bool needsTag = tags != null && tags.Value.Length > 0;
2911  if (controllers.None() || (needsTag && controllers.None(c => c.Item.HasTag(tags))))
2912  {
2913  controllers = GetConnectedComponents<Controller>(recursive: true);
2914  }
2915  if (needsTag)
2916  {
2917  controllers.RemoveAll(c => !c.Item.HasTag(tags));
2918  }
2919  return controllers.Count < 2 ?
2920  controllers.FirstOrDefault() :
2921  controllers.FirstOrDefault(c => c.GetFocusTarget() == this) ?? controllers.FirstOrDefault();
2922  }
2923 
2924  public bool TryFindController(out Controller controller, ImmutableArray<Identifier>? tags = null)
2925  {
2926  controller = FindController(tags: tags);
2927  return controller != null;
2928  }

2935  public void SendSignal(Signal signal, string connectionName)
2936  {
2937  if (connections == null) { return; }
2938  if (!connections.TryGetValue(connectionName, out Connection connection)) { return; }
2939 
2940  signal.source ??= this;
2941  SendSignal(signal, connection);
2942  }
2943 
2944  private readonly HashSet<(Signal Signal, Connection Connection)> delayedSignals = new HashSet<(Signal Signal, Connection Connection)>();
2945 
2946  public void SendSignal(Signal signal, Connection connection)
2947  {
2948  LastSentSignalRecipients.Clear();
2949  if (connections == null || connection == null) { return; }
2950 
2951  signal.stepsTaken++;
2952 
2953  //if the signal has been passed through this item multiple times already, interrupt it to prevent infinite loops
2954  if (signal.stepsTaken > 5 && signal.source != null)
2955  {
2956  int duplicateRecipients = 0;
2957  foreach (var recipient in signal.source.LastSentSignalRecipients)
2958  {
2959  if (recipient == connection)
2960  {
2961  duplicateRecipients++;
2962  if (duplicateRecipients > 2) { return; }
2963  }
2964  }
2965  }
2966 
2967  //use a coroutine to prevent infinite loops by creating a one
2968  //frame delay if the "signal chain" gets too long
2969  if (signal.stepsTaken > 10)
2970  {
2971  //if there's an equal signal waiting to be sent
2972  //to the same connection, don't add a new one
2973  signal.stepsTaken = 0;
2974  bool duplicateFound = false;
2975  foreach (var s in delayedSignals)
2976  {
2977  if (s.Connection == connection && s.Signal.source == signal.source && s.Signal.value == signal.value && s.Signal.sender == signal.sender)
2978  {
2979  duplicateFound = true;
2980  break;
2981  }
2982  }
2983  if (!duplicateFound)
2984  {
2985  delayedSignals.Add((signal, connection));
2986  CoroutineManager.StartCoroutine(DelaySignal(signal, connection));
2987  }
2988  }
2989  else
2990  {
2991  if (connection.Effects != null && signal.value != "0" && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(signal.value))
2992  {
2993  foreach (StatusEffect effect in connection.Effects)
2994  {
2995  if (condition <= 0.0f && effect.type != ActionType.OnBroken) { continue; }
2996  ApplyStatusEffect(effect, ActionType.OnUse, (float)Timing.Step);
2997  }
2998  }
2999  signal.source ??= this;
3000  connection.SendSignal(signal);
3001  }
3002  }
3003 
3004  private IEnumerable<CoroutineStatus> DelaySignal(Signal signal, Connection connection)
3005  {
3006  do
3007  {
3008  //wait at least one frame
3009  yield return CoroutineStatus.Running;
3010  } while (CoroutineManager.DeltaTime <= 0.0f);
3011 
3012  delayedSignals.Remove((signal, connection));
3013  connection.SendSignal(signal);
3014 
3015  yield return CoroutineStatus.Success;
3016  }

3035  public bool CanClientAccess(Client c)

3040  public bool TryInteract(Character user, bool ignoreRequiredItems = false, bool forceSelectKey = false, bool forceUseKey = false)
3041  {
3042  var campaignInteractionType = CampaignInteractionType;
3043 #if SERVER
3044  var ownerClient = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Find(c => c.Character == user);
3045  if (ownerClient != null)
3046  {
3047  if (!campaignInteractionTypePerClient.TryGetValue(ownerClient, out campaignInteractionType))
3048  {
3049  campaignInteractionType = CampaignMode.InteractionType.None;
3050  }
3051  }
3052 #endif
3053  if (CampaignMode.BlocksInteraction(campaignInteractionType))
3054  {
3055  return false;
3056  }

3058  bool picked = false, selected = false;
3059 #if CLIENT
3060  bool hasRequiredSkills = true;
3061  Skill requiredSkill = null;
3062  float skillMultiplier = 1;
3063 #endif
3064  if (!IsInteractable(user)) { return false; }
3065  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
3066  {
3067  bool pickHit = false, selectHit = false;
3068  if (user.IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
3069  {
3070  pickHit = false;
3071  selectHit = false;
3072  }
3073  else
3074  {
3075  if (forceSelectKey)
3076  {
3077  if (ic.PickKey == InputType.Select)
3078  {
3079  pickHit = true;
3080  }
3081  if (ic.SelectKey == InputType.Select)
3082  {
3083  selectHit = true;
3084  }
3085  }
3086  else if (forceUseKey)
3087  {
3088  if (ic.PickKey == InputType.Use)
3089  {
3090  pickHit = true;
3091  }
3092  if (ic.SelectKey == InputType.Use)
3093  {
3094  selectHit = true;
3095  }
3096  }
3097  else
3098  {
3099  pickHit = user.IsKeyHit(ic.PickKey);
3100  selectHit = user.IsKeyHit(ic.SelectKey);
3101 
3102 #if CLIENT
3103  //if the cursor is on a UI component, disable interaction with the left mouse button
3104  //to prevent accidentally selecting items when clicking UI elements
3105  if (user == Character.Controlled && GUI.MouseOn != null)
3106  {
3107  if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[ic.PickKey].MouseButton == 0)
3108  {
3109  pickHit = false;
3110  }
3111 
3112  if (GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[ic.SelectKey].MouseButton == 0)
3113  {
3114  selectHit = false;
3115  }
3116  }
3117 #endif
3118  }
3119  }
3120 #if CLIENT
3121  //use the non-mouse interaction key (E on both default and legacy keybinds) in wiring mode
3122  //LMB is used to manipulate wires, so using E to select connection panels is much easier
3123  if (Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen && GameMain.SubEditorScreen.WiringMode)
3124  {
3125  pickHit = selectHit = GameSettings.CurrentConfig.KeyMap.Bindings[InputType.Use].MouseButton == MouseButton.None ?
3126  user.IsKeyHit(InputType.Use) :
3127  user.IsKeyHit(InputType.Select);
3128  }
3129 #endif
3130  if (!pickHit && !selectHit) { continue; }
3131 
3132  bool showUiMsg = false;
3133 #if CLIENT
3134  if (!ic.HasRequiredSkills(user, out Skill tempRequiredSkill)) { hasRequiredSkills = false; skillMultiplier = ic.GetSkillMultiplier(); }
3135  showUiMsg = user == Character.Controlled && Screen.Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen;
3136 #endif
3137  if (!ignoreRequiredItems && !ic.HasRequiredItems(user, showUiMsg)) { continue; }
3138  if ((ic.CanBePicked && pickHit && ic.Pick(user)) ||
3139  (ic.CanBeSelected && selectHit && ic.Select(user)))
3140  {
3141  picked = true;
3142  ic.ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnPicked, 1.0f, user);
3143 #if CLIENT
3144  if (user == Character.Controlled) { GUI.ForceMouseOn(null); }
3145  if (tempRequiredSkill != null) { requiredSkill = tempRequiredSkill; }
3146 #endif
3147  if (ic.CanBeSelected && ic is not Door) { selected = true; }
3148  }
3149  }
3150  if (ParentInventory?.Owner == user &&
3151  GetComponent<ItemContainer>() != null)
3152  {
3153  //can't select ItemContainers in the character's inventory
3154  //(the inventory is drawn by hovering the cursor over the inventory slot, not as a hovering interface on the screen)
3155  selected = false;
3156  }
3157 
3158  if (!picked) { return false; }
3159 
3160  OnInteract?.Invoke();
3161 
3162  if (user != null)
3163  {
3164  if (user.SelectedItem == this)
3165  {
3166  if (user.IsKeyHit(InputType.Select) || forceSelectKey)
3167  {
3168  user.SelectedItem = null;
3169  }
3170  }
3171  else if (user.SelectedSecondaryItem == this)
3172  {
3173  if (user.IsKeyHit(InputType.Select) || forceSelectKey)
3174  {
3175  user.SelectedSecondaryItem = null;
3176  }
3177  }
3178  else if (selected)
3179  {
3180  if (IsSecondaryItem)
3181  {
3182  user.SelectedSecondaryItem = this;
3183  }
3184  else
3185  {
3186  user.SelectedItem = this;
3187  }
3188  }
3189  }
3190 
3191 #if CLIENT
3192  if (!hasRequiredSkills && Character.Controlled == user && Screen.Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen)
3193  {
3194  if (requiredSkill != null)
3195  {
3196  GUI.AddMessage(TextManager.GetWithVariables("InsufficientSkills",
3197  ("[requiredskill]", TextManager.Get("SkillName." + requiredSkill.Identifier), FormatCapitals.Yes),
3198  ("[requiredlevel]", ((int)(requiredSkill.Level * skillMultiplier)).ToString(), FormatCapitals.No)), GUIStyle.Red);
3199  }
3200  }
3201 #endif
3202 
3203  if (Container != null)
3204  {
3205  Container.RemoveContained(this);
3206  }
3207

3310  {

3314 
3315  if (Prefab.ContentPackage == ContentPackageManager.VanillaCorePackage &&
3316  /* we don't need info of every item, we can get a good sample size just by logging 5% */
3317  Rand.Range(0.0f, 1.0f) < 0.05f)

3320  }

3323  {

3332  return;
3333  }

3340  bool success = Rand.Range(0.0f, 0.5f) < ic.DegreeOfSuccess(user);
3341  ActionType conditionalActionType = success ? ActionType.OnSuccess : ActionType.OnFailure;
3342

3353  {

3355  GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(this, new ApplyStatusEffectEventData(ActionType.OnUse, ic, character, targetLimb, useTarget: character));
3356  }
3357 
3358  if (ic.DeleteOnUse) { remove = true; }
3359  }
3360 
3361  if (user != null)
3362  {
3363  var abilityItem = new AbilityApplyTreatment(user, character, this, targetLimb);
3364  user.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnApplyTreatment, abilityItem);
3365  }
3366

3368  }

3461  public void CreateDroppedStack(IEnumerable<Item> items, bool allowClientExecute)
3462  {
3463  if (!allowClientExecute && GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsClient: true }) { return; }
3464 
3465  int itemCount = items.Count();
3466 
3467  if (itemCount == 1) { return; }
3468 
3469  if (items.DistinctBy(it => it.Prefab).Count() > 1)
3470  {
3471  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Attempted to create a dropped stack of multiple different items ({string.Join(", ", items.DistinctBy(it => it.Prefab))})\n{Environment.StackTrace}");
3472  return;
3473  }
3474  if (items.Any(it => it.body == null))
3475  {
3476  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Attempted to create a dropped stack for an item with no body ({items.First().Prefab.Identifier})\n{Environment.StackTrace}");
3477  return;
3478  }
3479  if (items.None())
3480  {
3481  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Attempted to create a dropped stack of an empty list of items.\n{Environment.StackTrace}");
3482  return;
3483  }
3484 
3485  int maxStackSize = items.First().Prefab.MaxStackSize;
3486  if (itemCount > maxStackSize)
3487  {
3488  for (int i = 0; i < MathF.Ceiling(itemCount / maxStackSize); i++)
3489  {
3490  int startIndex = i * maxStackSize;
3491  items.ElementAt(startIndex).CreateDroppedStack(items.Skip(startIndex).Take(maxStackSize), allowClientExecute);
3492  }
3493  }
3494  else
3495  {
3496  droppedStack ??= new List<Item>();
3497  foreach (Item item in items)
3498  {
3499  if (!droppedStack.Contains(item))
3500  {
3501  droppedStack.Add(item);
3502  }
3503  }
3504  SetDroppedStackItemStates();
3505 #if SERVER
3506  if (GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsServer: true } server)
3507  {
3508  server.CreateEntityEvent(this, new DroppedStackEventData(droppedStack));
3509  }
3510 #endif
3511  }
3512  }

3514  private void RemoveFromDroppedStack(bool allowClientExecute)
3515  {
3516  if (!allowClientExecute && GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsClient: true }) { return; }
3517  if (droppedStack == null) { return; }
3518 
3519  body.Enabled = ParentInventory == null;
3520  isDroppedStackOwner = false;
3521  droppedStack.Remove(this);
3522  SetDroppedStackItemStates();
3523  droppedStack = null;
3524 #if SERVER
3525  if (GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsServer: true } server && !Removed)
3526  {
3527  server.CreateEntityEvent(this, new DroppedStackEventData(Enumerable.Empty<Item>()));
3528  }
3529 #endif
3530  }

3532  private void SetDroppedStackItemStates()
3533  {
3534  if (droppedStack == null) { return; }
3535  bool isFirst = true;
3536  foreach (Item item in droppedStack)
3537  {
3538  item.droppedStack = droppedStack;
3539  item.isDroppedStackOwner = isFirst;
3540  if (item.body != null)
3541  {
3542  item.body.Enabled = item.body.PhysEnabled = isFirst;
3543  if (isFirst)
3544  {
3545  item.isActive = true;
3546  item.body.ResetDynamics();
3547  }
3548  }
3549  isFirst = false;
3550  }
3551  }

3596  public List<(object obj, SerializableProperty property)> GetProperties<T>()
3597  {
3598  List<(object obj, SerializableProperty property)> allProperties = new List<(object obj, SerializableProperty property)>();
3599 
3600  List<SerializableProperty> itemProperties = SerializableProperty.GetProperties<T>(this);
3601  foreach (var itemProperty in itemProperties)
3602  {
3603  allProperties.Add((this, itemProperty));
3604  }
3605  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
3606  {
3607  List<SerializableProperty> componentProperties = SerializableProperty.GetProperties<T>(ic);
3608  foreach (var componentProperty in componentProperties)
3609  {
3610  allProperties.Add((ic, componentProperty));
3611  }
3612  }
3613  return allProperties;
3614  }
3615 
3616  private void WritePropertyChange(IWriteMessage msg, ChangePropertyEventData extraData, bool inGameEditableOnly)
3617  {
3618  //ignoreConditions: true = include all ConditionallyEditable properties at this point,
3619  //to ensure client/server doesn't get any properties mixed up if there's some conditions that can vary between the server and the clients
3620  var allProperties = inGameEditableOnly ? GetInGameEditableProperties(ignoreConditions: true) : GetProperties<Editable>();
3621  SerializableProperty property = extraData.SerializableProperty;
3622  ISerializableEntity entity = extraData.Entity;
3623  if (property != null)
3624  {
3625  if (allProperties.Count > 1)
3626  {
3627  int propertyIndex = allProperties.FindIndex(p => p.property == property && p.obj == entity);
3628  if (propertyIndex < 0)
3629  {
3630  throw new Exception($"Could not find the property \"{property.Name}\" in \"{entity.Name ?? "null"}\"");
3631  }
3632  msg.WriteVariableUInt32((uint)propertyIndex);
3633  }
3634 
3635  object value = property.GetValue(entity);
3636  if (value is string stringVal)
3637  {
3638  msg.WriteString(stringVal);
3639  }
3640  else if (value is Identifier idValue)
3641  {
3642  msg.WriteIdentifier(idValue);
3643  }
3644  else if (value is float floatVal)
3645  {
3646  msg.WriteSingle(floatVal);
3647  }
3648  else if (value is int intVal)
3649  {
3650  msg.WriteInt32(intVal);
3651  }
3652  else if (value is bool boolVal)
3653  {
3654  msg.WriteBoolean(boolVal);
3655  }
3656  else if (value is Color color)
3657  {
3658  msg.WriteByte(color.R);
3659  msg.WriteByte(color.G);
3660  msg.WriteByte(color.B);
3661  msg.WriteByte(color.A);
3662  }
3663  else if (value is Vector2 vector2)
3664  {
3665  msg.WriteSingle(vector2.X);
3666  msg.WriteSingle(vector2.Y);
3667  }
3668  else if (value is Vector3 vector3)
3669  {
3670  msg.WriteSingle(vector3.X);
3671  msg.WriteSingle(vector3.Y);
3672  msg.WriteSingle(vector3.Z);
3673  }
3674  else if (value is Vector4 vector4)
3675  {
3676  msg.WriteSingle(vector4.X);
3677  msg.WriteSingle(vector4.Y);
3678  msg.WriteSingle(vector4.Z);
3679  msg.WriteSingle(vector4.W);
3680  }
3681  else if (value is Point point)
3682  {
3683  msg.WriteInt32(point.X);
3684  msg.WriteInt32(point.Y);
3685  }
3686  else if (value is Rectangle rect)
3687  {
3688  msg.WriteInt32(rect.X);
3689  msg.WriteInt32(rect.Y);
3690  msg.WriteInt32(rect.Width);
3691  msg.WriteInt32(rect.Height);
3692  }
3693  else if (value is Enum)
3694  {
3695  msg.WriteInt32((int)value);
3696  }
3697  else if (value is string[] a)
3698  {
3699  msg.WriteInt32(a.Length);
3700  for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)
3701  {
3702  msg.WriteString(a[i] ?? "");
3703  }
3704  }
3705  else
3706  {
3707  throw new NotImplementedException("Serializing item properties of the type \"" + value.GetType() + "\" not supported");
3708  }
3709  }
3710  else
3711  {
3712  throw new ArgumentException("Failed to write propery value - property \"" + (property == null ? "null" : property.Name) + "\" is not serializable.");
3713  }
3714  }
3715 
3716  private List<(object obj, SerializableProperty property)> GetInGameEditableProperties(bool ignoreConditions = false)
3717  {
3718  if (ignoreConditions)
3719  {
3720  return GetProperties<ConditionallyEditable>().Union(GetProperties<InGameEditable>()).ToList();
3721  }
3722  else
3723  {
3724  return GetProperties<ConditionallyEditable>()
3725  .Where(ce => ce.property.GetAttribute<ConditionallyEditable>().IsEditable(this))
3726  .Union(GetProperties<InGameEditable>()).ToList();
3727  }
3728  }
3729 
3730  private void ReadPropertyChange(IReadMessage msg, bool inGameEditableOnly, Client sender = null)
3731  {
3732  //ignoreConditions: true = include all ConditionallyEditable properties at this point,
3733  //to ensure client/server doesn't get any properties mixed up if there's some conditions that can vary between the server and the clients
3734  var allProperties = inGameEditableOnly ? GetInGameEditableProperties(ignoreConditions: true) : GetProperties<Editable>();
3735  if (allProperties.Count == 0) { return; }
3736 
3737  int propertyIndex = 0;
3738  if (allProperties.Count > 1)
3739  {
3740  propertyIndex = (int)msg.ReadVariableUInt32();
3741  }
3742 
3743  if (propertyIndex >= allProperties.Count || propertyIndex < 0)
3744  {
3745  throw new Exception($"Error in ReadPropertyChange. Property index out of bounds (item: {Prefab.Identifier}, index: {propertyIndex}, property count: {allProperties.Count}, in-game editable only: {inGameEditableOnly})");
3746  }
3747 
3748  bool allowEditing = true;
3749  object parentObject = allProperties[propertyIndex].obj;
3750  SerializableProperty property = allProperties[propertyIndex].property;
3751  if (inGameEditableOnly && parentObject is ItemComponent ic)
3752  {
3753  if (!ic.AllowInGameEditing) { allowEditing = false; }
3754  }
3755 
3756  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
3757  {
3758  bool conditionAllowsEditing = true;
3759  if (property.GetAttribute<ConditionallyEditable>() is { } condition)
3760  {
3761  conditionAllowsEditing = condition.IsEditable(this);
3762  }
3763 
3764  bool canAccess = false;
3765  if (Container?.GetComponent<CircuitBox>() is { } cb &&
3766  Container.CanClientAccess(sender))
3767  {
3768  //items inside circuit boxes are inaccessible by "normal" means,
3769  //but the properties can still be edited through the circuit box UI
3770  canAccess = !cb.IsLocked();
3771  }
3772  else
3773  {
3774  canAccess = CanClientAccess(sender);
3775  }
3776 
3777  if (!canAccess || !conditionAllowsEditing)
3778  {
3779  allowEditing = false;
3780  }
3781  }
3782 
3783  var result = GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call<bool?>("item.readPropertyChange", this, property, parentObject, allowEditing, sender);
3784  if (result != null && result.Value)
3785  return;
3786 
3787  Type type = property.PropertyType;
3788  string logValue = "";
3789  if (type == typeof(string))
3790  {
3791  string val = msg.ReadString();
3792  var editableAttribute = property.GetAttribute<Editable>();
3793  if (editableAttribute != null && editableAttribute.MaxLength > 0 &&
3794  val.Length > editableAttribute.MaxLength)
3795  {
3796  val = val.Substring(0, editableAttribute.MaxLength);
3797  }
3798  logValue = val;
3799  if (allowEditing)
3800  {
3801  property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val);
3802  }
3803  }
3804  else if (type == typeof(Identifier))
3805  {
3806  Identifier val = msg.ReadIdentifier();
3807  logValue = val.Value;
3808  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3809  }
3810  else if (type == typeof(float))
3811  {
3812  float val = msg.ReadSingle();
3813  logValue = val.ToString("G", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
3814  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3815  }
3816  else if (type == typeof(int))
3817  {
3818  int val = msg.ReadInt32();
3819  logValue = val.ToString();
3820  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3821  }
3822  else if (type == typeof(bool))
3823  {
3824  bool val = msg.ReadBoolean();
3825  logValue = val.ToString();
3826  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3827  }
3828  else if (type == typeof(Color))
3829  {
3830  Color val = new Color(msg.ReadByte(), msg.ReadByte(), msg.ReadByte(), msg.ReadByte());
3831  logValue = XMLExtensions.ColorToString(val);
3832  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3833  }
3834  else if (type == typeof(Vector2))
3835  {
3836  Vector2 val = new Vector2(msg.ReadSingle(), msg.ReadSingle());
3837  logValue = XMLExtensions.Vector2ToString(val);
3838  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3839  }
3840  else if (type == typeof(Vector3))
3841  {
3842  Vector3 val = new Vector3(msg.ReadSingle(), msg.ReadSingle(), msg.ReadSingle());
3843  logValue = XMLExtensions.Vector3ToString(val);
3844  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3845  }
3846  else if (type == typeof(Vector4))
3847  {
3848  Vector4 val = new Vector4(msg.ReadSingle(), msg.ReadSingle(), msg.ReadSingle(), msg.ReadSingle());
3849  logValue = XMLExtensions.Vector4ToString(val);
3850  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3851  }
3852  else if (type == typeof(Point))
3853  {
3854  Point val = new Point(msg.ReadInt32(), msg.ReadInt32());
3855  logValue = XMLExtensions.PointToString(val);
3856  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3857  }
3858  else if (type == typeof(Rectangle))
3859  {
3860  Rectangle val = new Rectangle(msg.ReadInt32(), msg.ReadInt32(), msg.ReadInt32(), msg.ReadInt32());
3861  logValue = XMLExtensions.RectToString(val);
3862  if (allowEditing) { property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val); }
3863  }
3864  else if (type == typeof(string[]))
3865  {
3866  int arrayLength = msg.ReadInt32();
3867  string[] val = new string[arrayLength];
3868  for (int i = 0; i < arrayLength; i++)
3869  {
3870  val[i] = msg.ReadString();
3871  }
3872  if (allowEditing)
3873  {
3874  property.TrySetValue(parentObject, val);
3875  }
3876  }
3877  else if (typeof(Enum).IsAssignableFrom(type))
3878  {
3879  int intVal = msg.ReadInt32();
3880  try
3881  {
3882  if (allowEditing)
3883  {
3884  property.TrySetValue(parentObject, Enum.ToObject(type, intVal));
3885  logValue = property.GetValue(parentObject).ToString();
3886  }
3887  }
3888  catch (Exception e)
3889  {
3890 #if DEBUG
3891  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Failed to convert the int value \"" + intVal + "\" to " + type, e);
3892 #endif
3893  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce(
3894  "Item.ReadPropertyChange:" + Name + ":" + type,
3895  GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Warning,
3896  "Failed to convert the int value \"" + intVal + "\" to " + type + " (item " + Name + ")");
3897  }
3898  }
3899  else
3900  {
3901  return;
3902  }
3903 
3904 #if SERVER
3905  if (allowEditing)
3906  {
3907  //the property change isn't logged until the value stays unchanged for 1 second to prevent log spam when a player adjusts a value
3908  if (logPropertyChangeCoroutine != null)
3909  {
3910  CoroutineManager.StopCoroutines(logPropertyChangeCoroutine);
3911  }
3912  logPropertyChangeCoroutine = CoroutineManager.Invoke(() =>
3913  {
3914  GameServer.Log($"{sender.Character?.Name ?? sender.Name} set the value \"{property.Name}\" of the item \"{Name}\" to \"{logValue}\".", ServerLog.MessageType.ItemInteraction);
3915  }, delay: 1.0f);
3916  }
3917 #endif
3918 
3919  if (GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsServer: true } && parentObject is ISerializableEntity entity)
3920  {
3921  GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(this, new ChangePropertyEventData(property, entity));
3922  }
3923  }

3928  {
