3939  public static Item Load(ContentXElement element, Submarine submarine, bool createNetworkEvent, IdRemap idRemap)
3940  {
3941  string name = element.GetAttribute("name").Value;
3942  Identifier identifier = element.GetAttributeIdentifier("identifier", Identifier.Empty);
3943 
3944  if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(name) && identifier.IsEmpty)
3945  {
3946  string errorMessage = "Failed to load an item (both name and identifier were null):\n"+element.ToString();
3947  DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMessage);
3948  GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Item.Load:NameAndIdentifierNull", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMessage);
3949  return null;
3950  }
3951 
3952  Identifier pendingSwap = element.GetAttributeIdentifier("pendingswap", Identifier.Empty);
3953  ItemPrefab appliedSwap = null;
3954  ItemPrefab oldPrefab = null;
3955  if (!pendingSwap.IsEmpty && Level.Loaded?.Type != LevelData.LevelType.Outpost)
3956  {
3957  oldPrefab = ItemPrefab.Find(name, identifier);
3958  appliedSwap = ItemPrefab.Find(string.Empty, pendingSwap);
3959  identifier = pendingSwap;
3960  pendingSwap = Identifier.Empty;
3961  }
3962 
3963  ItemPrefab prefab = ItemPrefab.Find(name, identifier);
3964  if (prefab == null) { return null; }
3965 
3966  Rectangle rect = element.GetAttributeRect("rect", Rectangle.Empty);
3967  Vector2 centerPos = new Vector2(rect.X + rect.Width / 2, rect.Y - rect.Height / 2);
3968  if (appliedSwap != null)
3969  {
3970  rect.Width = (int)(prefab.Sprite.size.X * prefab.Scale);
3971  rect.Height = (int)(prefab.Sprite.size.Y * prefab.Scale);
3972  }
3973  else if (rect.Width == 0 && rect.Height == 0)
3974  {
3975  rect.Width = (int)(prefab.Size.X * prefab.Scale);
3976  rect.Height = (int)(prefab.Size.Y * prefab.Scale);
3977  }
3978 
3979  Item item = new Item(rect, prefab, submarine, callOnItemLoaded: false, id: idRemap.GetOffsetId(element))
3980  {
3981  Submarine = submarine,
3982  linkedToID = new List<ushort>(),
3983  PendingItemSwap = pendingSwap.IsEmpty ? null : MapEntityPrefab.Find(pendingSwap.Value) as ItemPrefab
3984  };
3985 
3986 #if SERVER
3987  if (createNetworkEvent)
3988  {
3989  Spawner.CreateNetworkEvent(new EntitySpawner.SpawnEntity(item));
3990  }
3991 #endif
3992 
3993  foreach (XAttribute attribute in (appliedSwap?.ConfigElement ?? element).Attributes())
3994  {
3995  if (!item.SerializableProperties.TryGetValue(attribute.NameAsIdentifier(), out SerializableProperty property)) { continue; }
3996  bool shouldBeLoaded = false;
3997  foreach (var propertyAttribute in property.Attributes.OfType<Serialize>())
3998  {
3999  if (propertyAttribute.IsSaveable == IsPropertySaveable.Yes)
4000  {
4001  shouldBeLoaded = true;
4002  break;
4003  }
4004  }
4005 
4006  if (shouldBeLoaded)
4007  {
4008  object prevValue = property.GetValue(item);
4009  property.TrySetValue(item, attribute.Value);
4010  //create network events for properties that differ from the prefab values
4011  //(e.g. if a character has an item with modified colors in their inventory)
4012  if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer && property.Attributes.OfType<Editable>().Any() &&
4013  (submarine == null || !submarine.Loading))
4014  {
4015  if (property.Name == "Tags" ||
4016  property.Name == "Condition" ||
4017  property.Name == "Description")
4018  {
4019  //these can be ignored, they're always written in the spawn data
4020  }
4021  else
4022  {
4023  if (!(property.GetValue(item)?.Equals(prevValue) ?? true))
4024  {
4025  GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(item, new ChangePropertyEventData(property, item));
4026  }
4027  }
4028  }
4029  }
4030  }
4031 
4032  item.ParseLinks(element, idRemap);
4033 
4034  bool thisIsOverride = element.GetAttributeBool("isoverride", false);
4035 
4036  //if we're overriding a non-overridden item in a sub/assembly xml or vice versa,
4037  //use the values from the prefab instead of loading them from the sub/assembly xml
4038  bool isItemSwap = appliedSwap != null;
4039  bool usePrefabValues = thisIsOverride != ItemPrefab.Prefabs.IsOverride(prefab) || isItemSwap;
4040  List<ItemComponent> unloadedComponents = new List<ItemComponent>(item.components);
4041  foreach (var subElement in element.Elements())
4042  {
4043  switch (subElement.Name.ToString().ToLowerInvariant())
4044  {
4045  case "upgrade":
4046  {
4047  var upgradeIdentifier = subElement.GetAttributeIdentifier("identifier", Identifier.Empty);
4048  UpgradePrefab upgradePrefab = UpgradePrefab.Find(upgradeIdentifier);
4049  int level = subElement.GetAttributeInt("level", 1);
4050  if (upgradePrefab != null)
4051  {
4052  item.AddUpgrade(new Upgrade(item, upgradePrefab, level, isItemSwap ? null : subElement));
4053  }
4054  else
4055  {
4056  DebugConsole.AddWarning($"An upgrade with identifier \"{upgradeIdentifier}\" on {item.Name} was not found. " +
4057  "It's effect will not be applied and won't be saved after the round ends.");
4058  }
4059  break;
4060  }
4061  case "itemstats":
4062  {
4063  item.StatManager.Load(subElement);
4064  break;
4065  }
4066  default:
4067  {
4068  ItemComponent component = unloadedComponents.Find(x => x.Name == subElement.Name.ToString());
4069  if (component == null) { continue; }
4070  component.Load(subElement, usePrefabValues, idRemap, isItemSwap);
4071  unloadedComponents.Remove(component);
4072  break;
4073  }
4074  }
4075  }
4076  if (usePrefabValues && !isItemSwap)
4077  {
4078  //use prefab scale when overriding a non-overridden item or vice versa
4079  item.Scale = prefab.ConfigElement.GetAttributeFloat(item.scale, "scale", "Scale");
4080  }
4081 
4082  item.Upgrades.ForEach(upgrade => upgrade.ApplyUpgrade());
4083 
4084  var availableSwapIds = element.GetAttributeIdentifierArray("availableswaps", Array.Empty<Identifier>());
4085  foreach (Identifier swapId in availableSwapIds)
4086  {
4087  ItemPrefab swapPrefab = ItemPrefab.Find(string.Empty, swapId);
4088  if (swapPrefab != null)
4089  {
4090  item.AvailableSwaps.Add(swapPrefab);
4091  }
4092  }
4093 
4094  if (element.GetAttributeBool("markedfordeconstruction", false)) { deconstructItems.Add(item); }
4095 
4096  float prevRotation = item.Rotation;
4097  if (element.GetAttributeBool("flippedx", false)) { item.FlipX(false); }
4098  if (element.GetAttributeBool("flippedy", false)) { item.FlipY(false); }
4099  item.Rotation = prevRotation;
4100 
4101  if (appliedSwap != null)
4102  {
4103  item.SpriteDepth = element.GetAttributeFloat("spritedepth", item.SpriteDepth);
4104  item.SpriteColor = element.GetAttributeColor("spritecolor", item.SpriteColor);
4105  item.Rotation = element.GetAttributeFloat("rotation", item.Rotation);
4106  item.PurchasedNewSwap = element.GetAttributeBool("purchasednewswap", false);
4107 
4108  float scaleRelativeToPrefab = element.GetAttributeFloat(item.scale, "scale", "Scale") / oldPrefab.Scale;
4109  item.Scale *= scaleRelativeToPrefab;
4110 
4111  if (oldPrefab.SwappableItem != null && prefab.SwappableItem != null)
4112  {
4113  Vector2 oldRelativeOrigin = (oldPrefab.SwappableItem.SwapOrigin - oldPrefab.Size / 2) * element.GetAttributeFloat(item.scale, "scale", "Scale");
4114  oldRelativeOrigin.Y = -oldRelativeOrigin.Y;
4115  oldRelativeOrigin = MathUtils.RotatePoint(oldRelativeOrigin, -item.RotationRad);
4116  Vector2 oldOrigin = centerPos + oldRelativeOrigin;
4117 
4118  Vector2 relativeOrigin = (prefab.SwappableItem.SwapOrigin - prefab.Size / 2) * item.Scale;
4119  relativeOrigin.Y = -relativeOrigin.Y;
4120  relativeOrigin = MathUtils.RotatePoint(relativeOrigin, -item.RotationRad);
4121  Vector2 origin = new Vector2(rect.X + rect.Width / 2, rect.Y - rect.Height / 2) + relativeOrigin;
4122 
4123  item.rect.Location -= (origin - oldOrigin).ToPoint();
4124  }
4125 
4126  if (item.PurchasedNewSwap && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(appliedSwap.SwappableItem?.SpawnWithId))
4127  {
4128  var container = item.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
4129  if (container != null)
4130  {
4131  container.SpawnWithId = appliedSwap.SwappableItem.SpawnWithId;
4132  }
4133  /*string[] splitIdentifier = appliedSwap.SwappableItem.SpawnWithId.Split(',');
4134  foreach (string id in splitIdentifier)
4135  {
4136  ItemPrefab itemToSpawn = ItemPrefab.Find(name: null, identifier: id.Trim());
4137  if (itemToSpawn == null)
4138  {
4139  DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Failed to spawn an item inside the purchased {item.Name} (could not find an item with the identifier \"{id}\").");
4140  }
4141  else
4142  {
4143  var spawnedItem = new Item(itemToSpawn, Vector2.Zero, null);
4144  item.OwnInventory.TryPutItem(spawnedItem, null, spawnedItem.AllowedSlots, createNetworkEvent: false);
4145  Spawner?.AddToSpawnQueue(itemToSpawn, item.OwnInventory, spawnIfInventoryFull: false);
4146  }
4147  }*/
4148  }
4149  item.PurchasedNewSwap = false;
4150  }
4151 
4152  Version savedVersion = submarine?.Info.GameVersion;
4153  if (element.Document?.Root != null && element.Document.Root.Name.ToString().Equals("gamesession", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
4154  {
4155  //character inventories are loaded from the game session file - use the version number of the saved game session instead of the sub
4156  //(the sub may have already been saved and up-to-date, even though the character inventories aren't)
4157  savedVersion = new Version(element.Document.Root.GetAttributeString("version", "0.0.0.0"));
4158  }
4159 
4160  float prevCondition = item.condition;
4161  if (savedVersion != null)
4162  {
4163  SerializableProperty.UpgradeGameVersion(item, item.Prefab.ConfigElement, savedVersion);
4164  }
4165 
4166  if (element.GetAttribute("conditionpercentage") != null)
4167  {

4169  }
4170  else
4171  {
4172  //backwards compatibility
4173  item.condition = element.GetAttributeFloat("condition", item.condition);
4174  //if the item was in full condition considering the unmodified health
4175  //(not taking possible HealthMultipliers added by mods into account),
4176  //make sure it stays in full condition
4177  if (item.condition > 0)
4178  {
4179  bool wasFullCondition = prevCondition >= item.Prefab.Health;
4180  if (wasFullCondition)
4181  {

4183  }
4184  item.condition = MathHelper.Clamp(item.condition, 0, item.MaxCondition);
4185  }

4188  item.RecalculateConditionValues();

4190

4192  {

4194  component.OnItemLoaded();

4236  private void Replace(ItemPrefab replacement, Option<ushort> newId, bool createEntityEvent)
4237  {
4238  Vector2 centerPos = Position;
4239 
4240  var newItem = new Item(replacement, Position, Submarine, id: newId.Fallback(NullEntityID))
4241  {
4242  SpriteDepth = SpriteDepth,
4243  SpriteColor = SpriteColor,
4244  Rotation = Rotation
4245  };
4246 
4247  float scaleRelativeToPrefab = Scale / Prefab.Scale;
4248  newItem.Scale *= scaleRelativeToPrefab;
4249 
4250  if (Prefab.SwappableItem != null && replacement.SwappableItem != null)
4251  {
4252  Vector2 oldRelativeOrigin = (Prefab.SwappableItem.SwapOrigin - Prefab.Size / 2) * scale;
4253  oldRelativeOrigin.Y = -oldRelativeOrigin.Y;
4254  oldRelativeOrigin = MathUtils.RotatePoint(oldRelativeOrigin, -RotationRad);
4255  Vector2 oldOrigin = centerPos + oldRelativeOrigin;
4256 
4257  Vector2 relativeOrigin = (Prefab.SwappableItem.SwapOrigin - Prefab.Size / 2) * Scale;
4258  relativeOrigin.Y = -relativeOrigin.Y;
4259  relativeOrigin = MathUtils.RotatePoint(relativeOrigin, -RotationRad);
4260  Vector2 origin = new Vector2(rect.X + rect.Width / 2f, rect.Y - rect.Height / 2f) + relativeOrigin;
4261 
4262  newItem.rect.Location -= (origin - oldOrigin).ToPoint();
4263  }
4264 
4265  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Prefab.SwappableItem?.SpawnWithId))
4266  {
4267  var newContainer = newItem.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
4268  if (newContainer != null)
4269  {
4270  newContainer.SpawnWithId = Prefab.SwappableItem.SpawnWithId;
4271  }
4272  }
4273 
4274  foreach (ItemComponent originalComponent in components)
4275  {
4276  var originalComponents = components.Where(c => c.GetType() == originalComponent.GetType()).ToList();
4277  var newComponents = newItem.components.Where(c => c.GetType() == originalComponent.GetType()).ToList();
4278  int originalIndex = originalComponents.IndexOf(originalComponent);
4279  if (originalIndex >= newComponents.Count)
4280  {
4281  //original item has components the new one doesn't -> no need to copy anything from them
4282  continue;
4283  }
4284  var newComponent = newComponents[originalIndex];
4285 
4286  foreach (var originalProperty in originalComponent.SerializableProperties)
4287  {
4288  if (originalProperty.Value.OverridePrefabValues || originalProperty.Value.GetAttribute<Editable>() is { TransferToSwappedItem: true })
4289  {
4290  newComponent.SerializableProperties[originalProperty.Key].TrySetValue(newComponent, originalProperty.Value.GetValue(originalComponent));
4291  }
4292  }
4293  }
4294 
4295  foreach (var linked in linkedTo)
4296  {
4297  newItem.linkedTo.Add(linked);
4298  if (linked.linkedTo.Contains(this))
4299  {
4300  linked.linkedTo.Add(newItem);
4301  }
4302  }
4303 
4304  var thisConnectionPanel = GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>();
4305  var newConnectionPanel = newItem.GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>();
4306  if (thisConnectionPanel != null && newConnectionPanel != null)
4307  {
4308  foreach (var connection in thisConnectionPanel.Connections)
4309  {
4310  var newConnection = newConnectionPanel.Connections.FirstOrDefault(c => c.Name == connection.Name);
4311  if (newConnection == null) { continue; }
4312  foreach (var wire in connection.Wires)
4313  {
4314  int connectionIndex = wire.Connections.IndexOf(connection);
4315  wire.RemoveConnection(this);
4316  wire.Connect(newConnection, connectionIndex, addNode: false);
4317  newConnection.ConnectWire(wire);
4318  }
4319  }
4320  }
4321 
4322  if (newId.IsNone() && replacement.SwappableItem != null)
4323  {
4324  var connectedItemsToSwap = newItem.GetConnectedItemsToSwap(replacement.SwappableItem);
4325  foreach (var kvp in connectedItemsToSwap)
4326  {
4327  Item itemToSwap = kvp.Key;
4328  ItemPrefab swapTo = kvp.Value;
4329  itemToSwap.Replace(swapTo, newId: Option.None, createEntityEvent);
4330  }
4331  }
4332 
4333 #if SERVER
4334  if (createEntityEvent && GameMain.Server is { } server)
4335  {
4336  server.CreateEntityEvent(this, new SwapItemEventData(newItem.Prefab, newItem.ID));
4337  }
4338 #endif
4339  Remove();
4340  }
4341 
4342  public Dictionary<Item, ItemPrefab> GetConnectedItemsToSwap(SwappableItem swappingTo)
4343  {
4344  Dictionary<Item, ItemPrefab> itemsToSwap = new();
4345  foreach (var (requiredTag, swapTo) in swappingTo.ConnectedItemsToSwap)
4346  {
4347  if (MapEntityPrefab.FindByIdentifier(swapTo) is not ItemPrefab replacement) { continue; }
4348 
4349  foreach (var linked in linkedTo)
4350  {
4351  if (linked is Item linkedItem && linkedItem.HasTag(requiredTag))
4352  {
4353  itemsToSwap.Add(linkedItem, replacement);
4354  }
4355  }
4356  if (GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>() is ConnectionPanel connectionPanel)
4357  {
4358  foreach (Connection c in connectionPanel.Connections)
4359  {
4360  foreach (var connectedComponent in GetConnectedComponentsRecursive<ItemComponent>(c))
4361  {
4362  if (!itemsToSwap.ContainsKey(connectedComponent.Item) &&
4363  connectedComponent.Item.HasTag(requiredTag))
4364  {
4365  itemsToSwap.Add(connectedComponent.Item, replacement);
4366  }
4367  }
4368  }
4369  }
4370  }
4371  return itemsToSwap;
4372  }
4373 
4374  public override XElement Save(XElement parentElement)
4375  {
4376  XElement element = new XElement("Item");
4377 
4378  element.Add(
4379  new XAttribute("name", Prefab.OriginalName),
4380  new XAttribute("identifier", Prefab.Identifier),
4381  new XAttribute("ID", ID),
4382  new XAttribute("markedfordeconstruction", deconstructItems.Contains(this)));
4383 
4384  if (PendingItemSwap != null)
4385  {
4386  element.Add(new XAttribute("pendingswap", PendingItemSwap.Identifier));
4387  }
4388 
4389  if (Rotation != 0f) { element.Add(new XAttribute("rotation", Rotation)); }
4390 
4391  if (ItemPrefab.Prefabs.IsOverride(Prefab)) { element.Add(new XAttribute("isoverride", "true")); }
4392  if (FlippedX) { element.Add(new XAttribute("flippedx", true)); }
4393  if (FlippedY) { element.Add(new XAttribute("flippedy", true)); }
4394 
4395  if (AvailableSwaps.Any())
4396  {
4397  element.Add(new XAttribute("availableswaps", string.Join(',', AvailableSwaps.Select(s => s.Identifier))));
4398  }
4399 
4400  if (!MathUtils.NearlyEqual(healthMultiplier, 1.0f))
4401  {
4402  element.Add(new XAttribute("healthmultiplier", HealthMultiplier.ToString("G", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
4403  }
4404 
4405  Item rootContainer = RootContainer ?? this;
4406  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(Submarine != null || rootContainer.ParentInventory?.Owner is Character);
4407 
4408  Vector2 subPosition = Submarine == null ? Vector2.Zero : Submarine.HiddenSubPosition;
4409 
4410  int width = ResizeHorizontal ? rect.Width : defaultRect.Width;
4411  int height = ResizeVertical ? rect.Height : defaultRect.Height;
4412  element.Add(new XAttribute("rect",
4413  (int)(rect.X - subPosition.X) + "," +
4414  (int)(rect.Y - subPosition.Y) + "," +
4415  width + "," + height));
4416 
4417  if (linkedTo != null && linkedTo.Count > 0)
4418  {
4419  bool isOutpost = Submarine != null && Submarine.Info.IsOutpost;
4420  var saveableLinked = linkedTo.Where(l => l.ShouldBeSaved && (l.Removed == Removed) && (l.Submarine == null || l.Submarine.Info.IsOutpost == isOutpost));
4421  element.Add(new XAttribute("linked", string.Join(",", saveableLinked.Select(l => l.ID.ToString()))));
4422  }
4423 
4424  SerializableProperty.SerializeProperties(this, element);
4425 
4426  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
4427  {
4428  ic.Save(element);
4429  }
4430 
4431  foreach (var upgrade in Upgrades)
4432  {
4433  upgrade.Save(element);
4434  }
4435 
4436  statManager?.Save(element);
4437 
4438  element.Add(new XAttribute("conditionpercentage", ConditionPercentage.ToString("G", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture)));
4439 
4440  var conditionAttribute = element.GetAttribute("condition");
4441  if (conditionAttribute != null) { conditionAttribute.Remove(); }
4442 
4443  parentElement.Add(element);
4444 
4445  return element;
4446  }
4447 
4448  public virtual void Reset()
4449  {
4450  var holdable = GetComponent<Holdable>();
4451  bool wasAttached = holdable?.Attached ?? false;
4452 
4453  SerializableProperties = SerializableProperty.DeserializeProperties(this, Prefab.ConfigElement);
4454  Sprite.ReloadXML();
4455  SpriteDepth = Sprite.Depth;
4456  condition = MaxCondition;
4457  components.ForEach(c => c.Reset());
4458  if (wasAttached)
4459  {
4460  holdable.AttachToWall();
4461  }
4462  }

4470  ic.OnMapLoaded();

4478  public override void ShallowRemove()
4479  {
4480  base.ShallowRemove();
4481 
4482  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
4483  {
4484  ic.ShallowRemove();
4485  }
4486  RemoveFromLists();
4487 
4488  if (body != null)
4489  {
4490  body.Remove();
4491  body = null;
4492  }
4493 
4494  GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("item.removed", this);
4495  }
4496 
4497  public override void Remove()
4498  {
4499  if (Removed)
4500  {
4501  DebugConsole.ThrowError("Attempting to remove an already removed item (" + Name + ")\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace());
4502  return;
4503  }
4504  DebugConsole.Log("Removing item " + Name + " (ID: " + ID + ")");
4505 
4506  base.Remove();
4507 
4508  foreach (Character character in Character.CharacterList)
4509  {
4510  if (character.SelectedItem == this) { character.SelectedItem = null; }
4511  if (character.SelectedSecondaryItem == this) { character.SelectedSecondaryItem = null; }
4512  }
4513 
4514  Door door = GetComponent<Door>();
4515  Ladder ladder = GetComponent<Ladder>();
4516  if (door != null || ladder != null)
4517  {
4518  foreach (WayPoint wp in WayPoint.WayPointList)
4519  {
4520  if (door != null && wp.ConnectedDoor == door) { wp.ConnectedGap = null; }
4521  if (ladder != null && wp.Ladders == ladder) { wp.Ladders = null; }
4522  }
4523  }
4524 
4525  connections?.Clear();
4526 
4527  if (parentInventory != null)
4528  {
4529  if (parentInventory is CharacterInventory characterInventory)
4530  {
4531  characterInventory.RemoveItem(this, tryEquipFromSameStack: true);
4532  }
4533  else
4534  {
4535  parentInventory.RemoveItem(this);
4536  }
4537  parentInventory = null;
4538  }
4539 
4540  foreach (ItemComponent ic in components)
4541  {
4542  ic.Remove();
4543 #if CLIENT
4544  ic.GuiFrame = null;
4545 #endif
4546  }
4547 
4548  RemoveFromLists();
4549 
4550  if (body != null)
4551  {
4552  body.Remove();
4553  body = null;
4554  }
4555 
4556  CurrentHull = null;
4557 
4558  if (StaticFixtures != null)
4559  {
4560  foreach (Fixture fixture in StaticFixtures)
4561  {
4562  //if the world is null, the body has already been removed
4563  //happens if the sub the fixture is attached to is removed before the item
4564  if (fixture.Body?.World == null) { continue; }
4565  fixture.Body.Remove(fixture);
4566  }
4567  StaticFixtures.Clear();
4568  }
4569 
4570  foreach (Item it in ItemList)
4571  {
4572  if (it.linkedTo.Contains(this))
4573  {
4574  it.linkedTo.Remove(this);
4575  }
4576  }
4577 
4578  RemoveProjSpecific();
4579 
4580  GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("item.removed", this);
4581  }
4582 
4583  private void RemoveFromLists()
4584  {
4585  ItemList.Remove(this);
4586  dangerousItems.Remove(this);
4587  repairableItems.Remove(this);
4588  sonarVisibleItems.Remove(this);
4589  cleanableItems.Remove(this);
4590  deconstructItems.Remove(this);
4591  RemoveFromDroppedStack(allowClientExecute: true);
4592  }
4593 
4594  partial void RemoveProjSpecific();
4595 
4596  public static void RemoveByPrefab(ItemPrefab prefab)
4597  {
4598  if (ItemList == null) { return; }
4599  List<Item> list = new List<Item>(ItemList);
4600  foreach (Item item in list)
4601  {
4602  if (((MapEntity)item).Prefab == prefab)
4603  {
4604  item.Remove();
4605  }
4606  }
4607  }
4608  }
